Wamur ahlaka bissalati wastabir 'alayha la nasaluka rizqan nahnu narzuquka wal'aqibatu littaqwa
Waqaloo lawla yateena biayatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu ma fee assuhufi aloola
Walaw anna ahlaknahum bi'athabin min qablihi laqaloo rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasoolan fanattabi'a ayatika min qabli an nathilla wanakhza
Qul kullun mutarabbisun fatarabbasoo fasata'lamoona man ashabu assirati assawiyyi wamani ihtada
Iqtaraba linnasi hisabuhum wahum fee ghaflatin mu'ridoon
Ma yateehim min thikrin min rabbihim muhdathin illa istama'oohu wahum yal'aboon
Lahiyatan quloobuhum waasarroo annajwa allatheena thalamoo hal hatha illa basharun mithlukum afatatoona assihra waantum tubsiroon
Qala rabbee ya'lamu alqawla fee assamai walardi wahuwa assamee'u al'aleem
Bal qaloo adghathu ahlamin bali iftarahu bal huwa sha'irun falyatina biayatin kama orsila alawwaloon
Ma amanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaha afahum yuminoon
Wama arsalna qablaka illa rijalan noohee ilayhim fasaloo ahla aththikri in kuntum la ta'lamoon
Wama ja'alnahum jasadan la yakuloona atta'ama wama kanoo khalideen
Thumma sadaqnahumu alwa'da faanjaynahum waman nashao waahlakna almusrifeen
Laqad anzalna ilaykum kitaban feehi thikrukum afala ta'qiloon
Wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanat thalimatan waanshana ba'daha qawman akhareen
Falamma ahassoo basana itha hum minha yarkudoon
La tarkudoo warji'oo ila ma otriftum feehi wamasakinikum la'allakum tusaloon
Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna thalimeen
Fama zalat tilka da'wahum hatta ja'alnahum haseedan khamideen
Wama khalaqna assamaa walarda wama baynahuma la'ibeen
Law aradna an nattakhitha lahwan lattakhathnahu min ladunna in kunna fa'ileen
Bal naqthifu bilhaqqi 'ala albatili fayadmaghuhu faitha huwa zahiqun walakumu alwaylu mimma tasifoon
Walahu man fee assamawati walardi waman 'indahu la yastakbiroona 'an 'ibadatihi wala yastahsiroon
Yusabbihoona allayla wannahara la yafturoon
Ami ittakhathoo alihatan mina alardi hum yunshiroon
Law kana feehima alihatun illa Allahu lafasadata fasubhana Allahi rabbi al'arshi 'amma yasifoon
La yusalu 'amma yaf'alu wahum yusaloon
Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan qul hatoo burhanakum hatha thikru man ma'iya wathikru man qablee bal aktharuhum la ya'lamoona alhaqqa fahum mu'ridoon
Wama arsalna min qablika min rasoolin illa noohee ilayhi annahu la ilaha illa ana fa'budoon
Waqaloo ittakhatha arrahmanu waladan subhanahu bal 'ibadun mukramoon
La yasbiqoonahu bilqawli wahum biamrihi ya'maloon
Ya'lamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum wala yashfa'oona illa limani irtada wahum min khashyatihi mushfiqoon
Waman yaqul minhum innee ilahun min doonihi fathalika najzeehi jahannama kathalika najzee aththalimeen
Awalam yara allatheena kafaroo anna assamawati walarda kanata ratqan fafataqnahuma waja'alna mina almai kulla shayin hayyin afala yuminoon
Waja'alna fee alardi rawasiya an tameeda bihim waja'alna feeha fijajan subulan la'allahum yahtadoon
Waja'alna assamaa saqfan mahfoothan wahum 'an ayatiha mu'ridoon
Wahuwa allathee khalaqa allayla wannahara washshamsa walqamara kullun fee falakin yasbahoon
Wama ja'alna libasharin min qablika alkhulda afain mitta fahumu alkhalidoon
Kullu nafsin thaiqatu almawti wanablookum bishsharri walkhayri fitnatan wailayna turja'oon
Waitha raaka allatheena kafaroo in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee yathkuru alihatakum wahum bithikri arrahmani hum kafiroon
Khuliqa alinsanu min 'ajalin saoreekum ayatee fala tasta'jiloon
Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwa'du in kuntum sadiqeen
Law ya'lamu allatheena kafaroo heena la yakuffoona 'an wujoohihimu annara wala 'an thuhoorihim wala hum yunsaroon
Bal tateehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum fala yastatee'oona raddaha wala hum yuntharoon
Walaqadi istuhzia birusulin min qablika fahaqa billatheena sakhiroo minhum ma kanoo bihi yastahzioon
Qul man yaklaokum billayli wannahari mina arrahmani bal hum 'an thikri rabbihim mu'ridoon
Am lahum alihatun tamna'uhum min doonina la yastatee'oona nasra anfusihim wala hum minna yushaboon
Bal matta'na haolai waabaahum hatta tala 'alayhimu al'umuru afala yarawna anna natee alarda nanqusuha min atrafiha afahumu alghaliboon
Qul innama onthirukum bilwahyi wala yasma'u assummu addu'aa itha ma yuntharoon
Walain massathum nafhatun min 'athabi rabbika layaqoolunna ya waylana inna kunna thalimeen
Wanada'u almawazeena alqista liyawmi alqiyamati fala tuthlamu nafsun shayan wain kana mithqala habbatin min khardalin atayna biha wakafa bina hasibeen
Walaqad atayna moosa waharoona alfurqana wadiyaan wathikran lilmuttaqeen
Allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaybi wahum mina assa'ati mushfiqoon
Wahatha thikrun mubarakun anzalnahu afaantum lahu munkiroon
Walaqad atayna ibraheema rushdahu min qablu wakunna bihi 'alimeen
Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi ma hathihi attamatheelu allatee antum laha 'akifoon
Qaloo wajadna abaana laha 'abideen
Qala laqad kuntum antum waabaokum fee dalalin mubeen
Qaloo ajitana bilhaqqi am anta mina alla'ibeen
Qala bal rabbukum rabbu assamawati walardi allathee fatarahunna waana 'ala thalikum mina ashshahideen
Watallahi laakeedanna asnamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen
Faja'alahum juthathan illa kabeeran lahum la'allahum ilayhi yarji'oon
Qaloo man fa'ala hatha bialihatina innahu lamina aththalimeen
Qaloo sami'na fatan yathkuruhum yuqalu lahu ibraheem
Qaloo fatoo bihi 'ala a'yuni annasi la'allahum yashhadoon
Qaloo aanta fa'alta hatha bialihatina ya ibraheem
Qala bal fa'alahu kabeeruhum hatha fasaloohum in kanoo yantiqoon
Faraja'oo ila anfusihim faqaloo innakum antumu aththalimoon
Thumma nukisoo 'ala ruoosihim laqad 'alimta ma haolai yantiqoon
Qala afata'budoona min dooni Allahi ma la yanfa'ukum shayan wala yadurrukum
Offin lakum walima ta'budoona min dooni Allahi afala ta'qiloon
Qaloo harriqoohu wansuroo alihatakum in kuntum fa'ileen
Qulna ya naru koonee bardan wasalaman 'ala ibraheem
Waaradoo bihi kaydan faja'alnahumu alakhsareen
Wanajjaynahu walootan ila alardi allatee barakna feeha lil'alameen
Wawahabna lahu ishaqa waya'qooba nafilatan wakullan ja'alna saliheen
Waja'alnahum aimmatan yahdoona biamrina waawhayna ilayhim fi'la alkhayrati waiqama assalati waeetaa azzakati wakanoo lana 'abideen
Walootan ataynahu hukman wa'ilman wanajjaynahu mina alqaryati allatee kanat ta'malu alkhabaitha innahum kanoo qawma sawin fasiqeen
Waadkhalnahu fee rahmatina innahu mina assaliheen
Wanoohan ith nada min qablu fastajabna lahu fanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbi al'atheem
Wanasarnahu mina alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina innahum kanoo qawma sawin faaghraqnahum ajma'een
Wadawooda wasulaymana ith yahkumani fee alharthi ith nafashat feehi ghanamu alqawmi wakunna lihukmihim shahideen
Fafahhamnaha sulaymana wakullan atayna hukman wa'ilman wasakhkharna ma'a dawooda aljibala yusabbihna wattayra wakunna fa'ileen
Wa'allamnahu san'ata laboosin lakum lituhsinakum min basikum fahal antum shakiroon
Walisulaymana arreeha 'asifatan tajree biamrihi ila alardi allatee barakna feeha wakunna bikulli shayin 'alimeen
Wamina ashshayateeni man yaghoosoona lahu waya'maloona 'amalan doona thalika wakunna lahum hafitheen
Waayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya addurru waanta arhamu arrahimeen
Fastajabna lahu fakashafna ma bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahu wamithlahum ma'ahum rahmatan min 'indina wathikra lil'abideen
Waisma'eela waidreesa watha alkifli kullun mina assabireen
Waadkhalnahum fee rahmatina innahum mina assaliheen
Watha annooni ith thahaba mughadiban fathanna an lan naqdira 'alayhi fanada fee aththulumati an la ilaha illa anta subhanaka innee kuntu mina aththalimeen
Fastajabna lahu wanajjaynahu mina alghammi wakathalika nunjee almumineen
Wazakariyya ith nada rabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheen
Fastajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya waaslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanoo yusari'oona fee alkhayrati wayad'oonana raghaban warahaban wakanoo lana khashi'een
Wallatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feeha min roohina waja'alnaha wabnaha ayatan lil'alameen
Inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatan waana rabbukum fao'budoon
Wataqatta'oo amrahum baynahum kullun ilayna raji'oon
Faman ya'mal mina assalihati wahuwa muminun fala kufrana lisa'yihi wainna lahu katiboon
Waharamun 'ala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarji'oon
Hatta itha futihat yajooju wamajooju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiloon
Waqtaraba alwa'du alhaqqu faitha hiya shakhisatun absaru allatheena kafaroo ya waylana qad kunna fee ghaflatin min hatha bal kunna thalimeen
Innakum wama ta'budoona min dooni Allahi hasabu jahannama antum laha waridoon
Law kana haolai alihatan ma waradooha wakullun feeha khalidoon
Lahum feeha zafeerun wahum feeha la yasma'oon
Inna allatheena sabaqat lahum minna alhusna olaika 'anha mub'adoon
La yasma'oona haseesaha wahum fee ma ishtahat anfusuhum khalidoon
La yahzunuhumu alfaza'u alakbaru watatalaqqahumu almalaikatu hatha yawmukumu allathee kuntum too'adoon
Yawma natwee assamaa katayyi assijlli lilkutubi kama badana awwala khalqin nu'eeduhu wa'dan 'alayna inna kunna fa'ileen
Walaqad katabna fee azzaboori min ba'di aththikri anna alarda yarithuha 'ibadiya assalihoon
Inna fee hatha labalaghan liqawmin 'abideen
Wama arsalnaka illa rahmatan lil'alameen
Qul innama yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antum muslimoon
Fain tawallaw faqul athantukum 'ala sawain wain adree aqareebun am ba'eedun ma too'adoon
Innahu ya'lamu aljahra mina alqawli waya'lamu ma taktumoon
Wain adree la'allahu fitnatun lakum wamata'un ila heen
Qala rabbi ohkum bilhaqqi warabbuna arrahmanu almusta'anu 'ala ma tasifoon
Ya ayyuha annasu ittaqoo rabbakum inna zalzalata assa'ati shayon 'atheem
Yawma tarawnaha tathhalu kullu murdi'atin 'amma arda'at watada'u kullu thati hamlin hamlaha watara annasa sukara wama hum bisukara walakinna 'athaba Allahi shadeed
Wamina annasi man yujadilu fee Allahi bighayri 'ilmin wayattabi'u kulla shaytanin mareed
Kutiba 'alayhi annahu man tawallahu faannahu yudilluhu wayahdeehi ila 'athabi assa'eer

Ya ayyuha annasu in kuntum fee raybin mina alba'thi fainna khalaqnakum min turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min 'alaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fee alarhami ma nashao ila ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflan thumma litablughoo ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffa waminkum man yuraddu ila arthali al'umuri likayla ya'lama min ba'di 'ilmin shayan watara alarda hamidatan faitha anzalna 'alayha almaa ihtazzat warabat waanbatat min kulli zawjin baheej
Thalika bianna Allaha huwa alhaqqu waannahu yuhyee almawta waannahu 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Waanna assa'ata atiyatun la rayba feeha waanna Allaha yab'athu man fee alquboor
Wamina annasi man yujadilu fee Allahi bighayri 'ilmin wala hudan wala kitabin muneer
Thaniya 'itfihi liyudilla 'an sabeeli Allahi lahu fee addunya khizyun wanutheequhu yawma alqiyamati 'athaba alhareeq
Thalika bima qaddamat yadaka waanna Allaha laysa bithallamin lil'abeed
Wamina annasi man ya'budu Allaha 'ala harfin fain asabahu khayrun itmaanna bihi wain asabathu fitnatun inqalaba 'ala wajhihi khasira addunya walakhirata thalika huwa alkhusranu almubeen
Yad'oo min dooni Allahi ma la yadurruhu wama la yanfa'uhu thalika huwa addalalu alba'eed
Yad'oo laman darruhu aqrabu min naf'ihi labisa almawla walabisa al'asheer
Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu inna Allaha yaf'alu ma yureed
Man kana yathunnu an lan yansurahu Allahu fee addunya walakhirati falyamdud bisababin ila assamai thumma liyaqta' falyanthur hal yuthhibanna kayduhu ma yagheeth
Wakathalika anzalnahu ayatin bayyinatin waanna Allaha yahdee man yureed
Inna allatheena amanoo wallatheena hadoo wassabieena wannasara walmajoosa wallatheena ashrakoo inna Allaha yafsilu baynahum yawma alqiyamati inna Allaha 'ala kulli shayin shaheed

Alam tara anna Allaha yasjudu lahu man fee assamawati waman fee alardi washshamsu walqamaru wannujoomu waljibalu washshajaru waddawabbu wakatheerun mina annasi wakatheerun haqqa 'alayhi al'athabu waman yuhini Allahu fama lahu min mukrimin inna Allaha yaf'alu ma yasha
Hathani khasmani ikhtasamoo fee rabbihim fallatheena kafaroo qutti'at lahum thiyabun min narin yusabbu min fawqi ruoosihimu alhameem
Yusharu bihi ma fee butoonihim waljulood
Walahum maqami'u min hadeed
Kullama aradoo an yakhrujoo minha min ghammin o'eedoo feeha wathooqoo 'athaba alhareeq
Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu yuhallawna feeha min asawira min thahabin waluluan walibasuhum feeha hareer
Wahudoo ila attayyibi mina alqawli wahudoo ila sirati alhameed
Inna allatheena kafaroo wayasuddoona 'an sabeeli Allahi walmasjidi alharami allathee ja'alnahu linnasi sawaan al'akifu feehi walbadi waman yurid feehi biilhadin bithulmin nuthiqhu min 'athabin aleem
Waith bawwana liibraheema makana albayti an la tushrik bee shayan watahhir baytiya littaifeena walqaimeena warrukka'i assujood
Waaththin fee annasi bilhajji yatooka rijalan wa'ala kulli damirin yateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq
Liyashhadoo manafi'a lahum wayathkuroo isma Allahi fee ayyamin ma'loomatin 'ala ma razaqahum min baheemati alan'ami fakuloo minha waat'imoo albaisa alfaqeer
Thumma lyaqdoo tafathahum walyoofoo nuthoorahum walyattawwafoo bilbayti al'ateeq
Thalika waman yu'aththim hurumati Allahi fahuwa khayrun lahu 'inda rabbihi waohillat lakumu alan'amu illa ma yutla 'alaykum fajtaniboo arrijsa mina alawthani wajtaniboo qawla azzoor
Hunafaa lillahi ghayra mushrikeena bihi waman yushrik billahi fakaannama kharra mina assamai fatakhtafuhu attayru aw tahwee bihi arreehu fee makanin saheeq
Thalika waman yu'aththim sha'aira Allahi fainnaha min taqwa alquloob
Lakum feeha manafi'u ila ajalin musamman thumma mahilluha ila albayti al'ateeq
Walikulli ommatin ja'alna mansakan liyathkuroo isma Allahi 'ala ma razaqahum min baheemati alan'ami failahukum ilahun wahidun falahu aslimoo wabashshiri almukhbiteen
Allatheena itha thukira Allahu wajilat quloobuhum wassabireena 'ala ma asabahum walmuqeemee assalati wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon

Walbudna ja'alnaha lakum min sha'airi Allahi lakum feeha khayrun fathkuroo isma Allahi 'alayha sawaffa faitha wajabat junoobuha fakuloo minha waat'imoo alqani'a walmu'tarra kathalika sakhkharnaha lakum la'allakum tashkuroon
Lan yanala Allaha luhoomuha wala dimaoha walakin yanaluhu attaqwa minkum kathalika sakhkharaha lakum litukabbiroo Allaha 'ala ma hadakum wabashshiri almuhsineen
Inna Allaha yudafi'u 'ani allatheena amanoo inna Allaha la yuhibbu kulla khawwanin kafoor
Othina lillatheena yuqataloona biannahum thulimoo wainna Allaha 'ala nasrihim laqadeer

Allatheena okhrijoo min diyarihim bighayri haqqin illa an yaqooloo rabbuna Allahu walawla daf'u Allahi annasa ba'dahum biba'din lahuddimat sawami'u wabiya'un wasalawatun wamasajidu yuthkaru feeha ismu Allahi katheeran walayansuranna Allahu man yansuruhu inna Allaha laqawiyyun 'azeez
Allatheena in makkannahum fee alardi aqamoo assalata waatawoo azzakata waamaroo bilma'roofi wanahaw 'ani almunkari walillahi 'aqibatu alomoor
Wain yukaththibooka faqad kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin wa'adun wathamood
Waqawmu ibraheema waqawmu loot
Waashabu madyana wakuththiba moosa faamlaytu lilkafireena thumma akhathtuhum fakayfa kana nakeer
Fakaayyin min qaryatin ahlaknaha wahiya thalimatun fahiya khawiyatun 'ala 'urooshiha wabirin mu'attalatin waqasrin masheed
Afalam yaseeroo fee alardi fatakoona lahum quloobun ya'qiloona biha aw athanun yasma'oona biha fainnaha la ta'ma alabsaru walakin ta'ma alquloobu allatee fee assudoor
Wayasta'jiloonaka bil'athabi walan yukhlifa Allahu wa'dahu wainna yawman 'inda rabbika kaalfi sanatin mimma ta'uddoon
Wakaayyin min qaryatin amlaytu laha wahiya thalimatun thumma akhathtuha wailayya almaseer
Qul ya ayyuha annasu innama ana lakum natheerun mubeen
Fallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati lahum maghfiratun warizqun kareem
Wallatheena sa'aw fee ayatina mu'ajizeena olaika ashabu aljaheem
Wama arsalna min qablika min rasoolin wala nabiyyin illa itha tamanna alqa ashshaytanu fee omniyyatihi fayansakhu Allahu ma yulqee ashshaytanu thumma yuhkimu Allahu ayatihi wallahu 'aleemun hakeem
Liyaj'ala ma yulqee ashshaytanu fitnatan lillatheena fee quloobihim maradun walqasiyati quloobuhum wainna aththalimeena lafee shiqaqin ba'eed
Waliya'lama allatheena ootoo al'ilma annahu alhaqqu min rabbika fayuminoo bihi fatukhbita lahu quloobuhum wainna Allaha lahadi allatheena amanoo ila siratin mustaqeem
Wala yazalu allatheena kafaroo fee miryatin minhu hatta tatiyahumu assa'atu baghtatan aw yatiyahum 'athabu yawmin 'aqeem
Almulku yawmaithin lillahi yahkumu baynahum fallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati fee jannati anna'eem
Wallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina faolaika lahum 'athabun muheen
Wallatheena hajaroo fee sabeeli Allahi thumma qutiloo aw matoo layarzuqannahumu Allahu rizqan hasanan wainna Allaha lahuwa khayru arraziqeen
Layudkhilannahum mudkhalan yardawnahu wainna Allaha la'aleemun haleem
Thalika waman 'aqaba bimithli ma 'ooqiba bihi thumma bughiya 'alayhi layansurannahu Allahu inna Allaha la'afuwwun ghafoor
Thalika bianna Allaha yooliju allayla fee annahari wayooliju annahara fee allayli waanna Allaha samee'un baseer
Thalika bianna Allaha huwa alhaqqu waanna ma yad'oona min doonihi huwa albatilu waanna Allaha huwa al'aliyyu alkabeer
Alam tara anna Allaha anzala mina assamai maan fatusbihu alardu mukhdarratan inna Allaha lateefun khabeer
Lahu ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi wainna Allaha lahuwa alghaniyyu alhameed
Alam tara anna Allaha sakhkhara lakum ma fee alardi walfulka tajree fee albahri biamrihi wayumsiku assamaa an taqa'a 'ala alardi illa biithnihi inna Allaha binnasi laraoofun raheem
Wahuwa allathee ahyakum thumma yumeetukum thumma yuhyeekum inna alinsana lakafoor
Likulli ommatin ja'alna mansakan hum nasikoohu fala yunazi'unnaka fee alamri wad'u ila rabbika innaka la'ala hudan mustaqeem
Wain jadalooka faquli Allahu a'lamu bima ta'maloon
Allahu yahkumu baynakum yawma alqiyamati feema kuntum feehi takhtalifoon
Alam ta'lam anna Allaha ya'lamu ma fee assamai walardi inna thalika fee kitabin inna thalika 'ala Allahi yaseer
Waya'budoona min dooni Allahi ma lam yunazzil bihi sultanan wama laysa lahum bihi 'ilmun wama liththalimeena min naseer

Waitha tutla 'alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ta'rifu fee wujoohi allatheena kafaroo almunkara yakadoona yastoona billatheena yatloona 'alayhim ayatina qul afaonabbiokum bisharrin min thalikum annaru wa'adaha Allahu allatheena kafaroo wabisa almaseer

Ya ayyuha annasu duriba mathalun fastami'oo lahu inna allatheena tad'oona min dooni Allahi lan yakhluqoo thubaban walawi ijtama'oo lahu wain yaslubuhumu aththubabu shayan la yastanqithoohu minhu da'ufa attalibu walmatloob
Ma qadaroo Allaha haqqa qadrihi inna Allaha laqawiyyun 'azeez
Allahu yastafee mina almalaikati rusulan wamina annasi inna Allaha samee'un baseer
Ya'lamu ma bayna aydeehim wama khalfahum waila Allahi turja'u alomoor
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo irka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo rabbakum waf'aloo alkhayra la'allakum tuflihoon

Wajahidoo fee Allahi haqqa jihadihi huwa ijtabakum wama ja'ala 'alaykum fee addeeni min harajin millata abeekum ibraheema huwa sammakumu almuslimeena min qablu wafee hatha liyakoona arrasoolu shaheedan 'alaykum watakoonoo shuhadaa 'ala annasi faaqeemoo assalata waatoo azzakata wa'tasimoo billahi huwa mawlakum fani'ma almawla wani'ma annaseer
Qad aflaha almuminoon
Allatheena hum fee salatihim khashi'oon
Wallatheena hum 'ani allaghwi mu'ridoon
Wallatheena hum lizzakati fa'iloon
Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon
Illa 'ala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeen
Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu al'adoon
Wallatheena hum liamanatihim wa'ahdihim ra'oon
Wallatheena hum 'ala salawatihim yuhafithoon
Olaika humu alwarithoon
Allatheena yarithoona alfirdawsa hum feeha khalidoon
Walaqad khalaqna alinsana min sulalatin min teen
Thumma ja'alnahu nutfatan fee qararin makeen
Thumma khalaqna annutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqna al'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaqna almudghata 'ithaman fakasawna al'ithama lahman thumma anshanahu khalqan akhara fatabaraka Allahu ahsanu alkhaliqeen
Thumma innakum ba'da thalika lamayyitoon
Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamati tub'athoon
Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sab'a taraiqa wama kunna 'ani alkhalqi ghafileen
Waanzalna mina assamai maan biqadarin faaskannahu fee alardi wainna 'ala thahabin bihi laqadiroon
Faanshana lakum bihi jannatin min nakheelin waa'nabin lakum feeha fawakihu katheeratun waminha takuloon
Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaa tanbutu bidduhni wasibghin lilakileen
Wainna lakum fee alan'ami la'ibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butooniha walakum feeha manafi'u katheeratun waminha takuloon
Wa'alayha wa'ala alfulki tuhmaloon
Walaqad arsalna noohan ila qawmihi faqala ya qawmi o'budoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon
Faqala almalao allatheena kafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharun mithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala 'alaykum walaw shaa Allahu laanzala malaikatan ma sami'na bihatha fee abaina alawwaleen
In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihi hatta heen
Qala rabbi onsurnee bima kaththaboon

Faawhayna ilayhi ani isna'i alfulka bia'yunina wawahyina faitha jaa amruna wafara attannooru fasluk feeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illa man sabaqa 'alayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibnee fee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoon
Faitha istawayta anta waman ma'aka 'ala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allathee najjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen
Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakan waanta khayru almunzileen
Inna fee thalika laayatin wain kunna lamubtaleen
Thumma anshana min ba'dihim qarnan akhareen
Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum ani o'budoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon

Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biliqai alakhirati waatrafnahum fee alhayati addunya ma hatha illa basharun mithlukum yakulu mimma takuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon
Walain ata'tum basharan mithlakum innakum ithan lakhasiroon
Aya'idukum annakum itha mittum wakuntum turaban wa'ithaman annakum mukhrajoon
Hayhata hayhata lima too'adoon
In hiya illa hayatuna addunya namootu wanahya wama nahnu bimab'ootheen
In huwa illa rajulun iftara 'ala Allahi kathiban wama nahnu lahu bimumineen
Qala rabbi onsurnee bima kaththaboon
Qala 'amma qaleelin layusbihunna nadimeen
Faakhathathumu assayhatu bilhaqqi faja'alnahum ghuthaan fabu'dan lilqawmi aththalimeen
Thumma anshana min ba'dihim quroonan akhareen
Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalaha wama yastakhiroon
Thumma arsalna rusulana tatra kulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohu faatba'na ba'dahum ba'dan waja'alnahum ahadeetha fabu'dan liqawmin la yuminoon
Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahu haroona biayatina wasultanin mubeen
Ila fir'awna wamalaihi fastakbaroo wakanoo qawman 'aleen
Faqaloo anuminu libasharayni mithlina waqawmuhuma lana 'abidoon
Fakaththaboohuma fakanoo mina almuhlakeen
Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba la'allahum yahtadoon
Waja'alna ibna maryama waommahu ayatan waawaynahuma ila rabwatin thati qararin wama'een
Ya ayyuha arrusulu kuloo mina attayyibati wa'maloo salihan innee bima ta'maloona 'aleem
Wainna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatan waana rabbukum fattaqoon
Fataqatta'oo amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoon
Fatharhum fee ghamratihim hatta heen
Ayahsaboona annama numidduhum bihi min malin wabaneen
Nusari'u lahum fee alkhayrati bal la yash'uroon
Inna allatheena hum min khashyati rabbihim mushfiqoon
Wallatheena hum biayati rabbihim yuminoon
Wallatheena hum birabbihim la yushrikoon
Wallatheena yutoona ma ataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim raji'oon
Olaika yusari'oona fee alkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoon
Wala nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bilhaqqi wahum la yuthlamoon
Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hatha walahum a'malun min dooni thalika hum laha 'amiloon
Hatta itha akhathna mutrafeehim bil'athabi itha hum yajaroon
La tajaroo alyawma innakum minna la tunsaroon
Qad kanat ayatee tutla 'alaykum fakuntum 'ala a'qabikum tankisoon
Mustakbireena bihi samiran tahjuroon
Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahum ma lam yati abaahumu alawwaleen
Am lam ya'rifoo rasoolahum fahum lahu munkiroon
Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahum bilhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoon
Walawi ittaba'a alhaqqu ahwaahum lafasadati assamawatu walardu waman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum 'an thikrihim mu'ridoon
Am tasaluhum kharjan fakharaju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru arraziqeen
Wainnaka latad'oohum ila siratin mustaqeem
Wainna allatheena la yuminoona bilakhirati 'ani assirati lanakiboon
Walaw rahimnahum wakashafna ma bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihim ya'mahoon
Walaqad akhathnahum bil'athabi fama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarra'oon
Hatta itha fatahna 'alayhim baban tha 'athabin shadeedin itha hum feehi mublisoon
Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assam'a walabsara walafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroon
Wahuwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoon
Wahuwa allathee yuhyee wayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahari afala ta'qiloon
Bal qaloo mithla ma qala alawwaloon
Qaloo aitha mitna wakunna turaban wa'ithaman ainna lamab'oothoon
Laqad wu'idna nahnu waabaona hatha min qablu in hatha illa asateeru alawwaleen
Qul limani alardu waman feeha in kuntum ta'lamoon
Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afala tathakkaroon
Qul man rabbu assamawati assab'i warabbu al'arshi al'atheem
Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afala tattaqoon
Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shayin wahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru 'alayhi in kuntum ta'lamoon
Sayaqooloona lillahi qul faanna tusharoon
Bal ataynahum bilhaqqi wainnahum lakathiboon
Ma ittakhatha Allahu min waladin wama kana ma'ahu min ilahin ithan lathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa wala'ala ba'duhum 'ala ba'din subhana Allahi 'amma yasifoon
'alimi alghaybi washshahadati fata'ala 'amma yushrikoon
Qul rabbi imma turiyannee ma yoo'adoon
Rabbi fala taj'alnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen
Wainna 'ala an nuriyaka ma na'iduhum laqadiroon
Idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu assayyiata nahnu a'lamu bima yasifoon
Waqul rabbi a'oothu bika min hamazati ashshayateen
Waa'oothu bika rabbi an yahduroon
Hatta itha jaa ahadahumu almawtu qala rabbi irji'oon
La'allee a'malu salihan feema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qailuha wamin waraihim barzakhun ila yawmi yub'athoon
Faitha nufikha fee assoori fala ansaba baynahum yawmaithin wala yatasaaloon
Faman thaqulat mawazeenuhu faolaika humu almuflihoon
Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faolaika allatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoon
Talfahu wujoohahumu annaru wahum feeha kalihoon
Alam takun ayatee tutla 'alaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon
Qaloo rabbana ghalabat 'alayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen
Rabbana akhrijna minha fain 'udna fainna thalimoon
Qala ikhsaoo feeha wala tukallimoon
Innahu kana fareequn min 'ibadee yaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfir lana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen
Fattakhathtumoohum sikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntum minhum tadhakoon
Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabaroo annahum humu alfaizoon
Qala kam labithtum fee alardi 'adada sineen
Qaloo labithna yawman aw ba'da yawmin fasali al'addeen
Qala in labithtum illa qaleelan law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon
Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakum 'abathan waannakum ilayna la turja'oon
Fata'ala Allahu almaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al'arshi alkareem
Waman yad'u ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara la burhana lahu bihi fainnama hisabuhu 'inda rabbihi innahu la yuflihu alkafiroon
Waqul rabbi ighfir warham waanta khayru arrahimeen
Sooratun anzalnaha wafaradnaha waanzalna feeha ayatin bayyinatin la'allakum tathakkaroon

Azzaniyatu wazzanee fajlidoo kulla wahidin minhuma miata jaldatin wala takhuthkum bihima rafatun fee deeni Allahi in kuntum tuminoona billahi walyawmi alakhiri walyashhad 'athabahuma taifatun mina almumineen
Azzanee la yankihu illa zaniyatan aw mushrikatan wazzaniyatu la yankihuha illa zanin aw mushrikun wahurrima thalika 'ala almumineen
Wallatheena yarmoona almuhsanati thumma lam yatoo biarba'ati shuhadaa fajlidoohum thamaneena jaldatan wala taqbaloo lahum shahadatan abadan waolaika humu alfasiqoon
Illa allatheena taboo min ba'di thalika waaslahoo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
Wallatheena yarmoona azwajahum walam yakun lahum shuhadao illa anfusuhum fashahadatu ahadihim arba'u shahadatin billahi innahu lamina assadiqeen
Walkhamisatu anna la'nata Allahi 'alayhi in kana mina alkathibeen
Wayadrao 'anha al'athaba an tashhada arba'a shahadatin billahi innahu lamina alkathibeen
Walkhamisata anna ghadaba Allahi 'alayha in kana mina assadiqeen
Walawla fadlu Allahi 'alaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha tawwabun hakeem
Inna allatheena jaoo bilifki 'usbatun minkum la tahsaboohu sharran lakum bal huwa khayrun lakum likulli imriin minhum ma iktasaba mina alithmi wallathee tawalla kibrahu minhum lahu 'athabun 'atheem
Lawla ith sami'tumoohu thanna almuminoona walmuminatu bianfusihim khayran waqaloo hatha ifkun mubeen
Lawla jaoo 'alayhi biarba'ati shuhadaa faith lam yatoo bishshuhadai faolaika 'inda Allahi humu alkathiboon
Walawla fadlu Allahi 'alaykum warahmatuhu fee addunya walakhirati lamassakum fee ma afadtum feehi 'athabun 'atheem
Ith talaqqawnahu bialsinatikum wataqooloona biafwahikum ma laysa lakum bihi 'ilmun watahsaboonahu hayyinan wahuwa 'inda Allahi 'atheem
Walawla ith sami'tumoohu qultum ma yakoonu lana an natakallama bihatha subhanaka hatha buhtanun 'atheem
Ya'ithukumu Allahu an ta'oodoo limithlihi abadan in kuntum mumineen
Wayubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati wallahu 'aleemun hakeem
Inna allatheena yuhibboona an tashee'a alfahishatu fee allatheena amanoo lahum 'athabun aleemun fee addunya walakhirati wallahu ya'lamu waantum la ta'lamoon
Walawla fadlu Allahi 'alaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha raoofun raheem

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tattabi'oo khutuwati ashshaytani waman yattabi' khutuwati ashshaytani fainnahu yamuru bilfahshai walmunkari walawla fadlu Allahi 'alaykum warahmatuhu ma zaka minkum min ahadin abadan walakinna Allaha yuzakkee man yashao wallahu samee'un 'aleem
Wala yatali oloo alfadli minkum wassa'ati an yutoo olee alqurba walmasakeena walmuhajireena fee sabeeli Allahi walya'foo walyasfahoo ala tuhibboona an yaghfira Allahu lakum wallahu ghafoorun raheem
Inna allatheena yarmoona almuhsanati alghafilati almuminati lu'inoo fee addunya walakhirati walahum 'athabun 'atheem
Yawma tashhadu 'alayhim alsinatuhum waaydeehim waarjuluhum bima kanoo ya'maloon
Yawmaithin yuwaffeehimu Allahu deenahumu alhaqqa waya'lamoona anna Allaha huwa alhaqqu almubeen
Alkhabeethatu lilkhabeetheena walkhabeethoona lilkhabeethati wattayyibatu littayyibeena wattayyiboona littayyibati olaika mubarraoona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratun warizqun kareem
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra buyootikum hatta tastanisoo watusallimoo 'ala ahliha thalikum khayrun lakum la'allakum tathakkaroon
Fain lam tajidoo feeha ahadan fala tadkhulooha hatta yuthana lakum wain qeela lakumu irji'oo farji'oo huwa azka lakum wallahu bima ta'maloona 'aleem
Laysa 'alaykum junahun an tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra maskoonatin feeha mata'un lakum wallahu ya'lamu ma tubdoona wama taktumoon
Qul lilmumineena yaghuddoo min absarihum wayahfathoo furoojahum thalika azka lahum inna Allaha khabeerun bima yasna'oon

Waqul lilmuminati yaghdudna min absarihinna wayahfathna furoojahunna wala yubdeena zeenatahunna illa ma thahara minha walyadribna bikhumurihinna 'ala juyoobihinna wala yubdeena zeenatahunna illa libu'oolatihinna aw abaihinna aw abai bu'oolatihinna aw abnaihinna aw abnai bu'oolatihinna aw ikhwanihinna aw banee ikhwanihinna aw banee akhawatihinna aw nisaihinna aw ma malakat aymanuhunna awi attabi'eena ghayri olee alirbati mina arrijali awi attifli allatheena lam yathharoo 'ala 'awrati annisai wala yadribna biarjulihinna liyu'lama ma yukhfeena min zeenatihinna watooboo ila Allahi jamee'an ayyuha almuminoona la'allakum tuflihoon
Waankihoo alayama minkum wassaliheena min 'ibadikum waimaikum in yakoonoo fuqaraa yughnihimu Allahu min fadlihi wallahu wasi'un 'aleem

Walyasta'fifi allatheena la yajidoona nikahan hatta yughniyahumu Allahu min fadlihi wallatheena yabtaghoona alkitaba mimma malakat aymanukum fakatiboohum in 'alimtum feehim khayran waatoohum min mali Allahi allathee atakum wala tukrihoo fatayatikum 'ala albighai in aradna tahassunan litabtaghoo 'arada alhayati addunya waman yukrihhunna fainna Allaha min ba'di ikrahihinna ghafoorun raheem
Walaqad anzalna ilaykum ayatin mubayyinatin wamathalan mina allatheena khalaw min qablikum wamaw'ithatan lilmuttaqeen

Allahu nooru assamawati walardi mathalu noorihi kamishkatin feeha misbahun almisbahu fee zujajatin azzujajatu kaannaha kawkabun durriyyun yooqadu min shajaratin mubarakatin zaytoonatin la sharqiyyatin wala gharbiyyatin yakadu zaytuha yudeeo walaw lam tamsashu narun noorun 'ala noorin yahdee Allahu linoorihi man yashao wayadribu Allahu alamthala linnasi wallahu bikulli shayin 'aleem
Fee buyootin athina Allahu an turfa'a wayuthkara feeha ismuhu yusabbihu lahu feeha bilghuduwwi walasal
Rijalun la tulheehim tijaratun wala bay'un 'an thikri Allahi waiqami assalati waeetai azzakati yakhafoona yawman tataqallabu feehi alquloobu walabsar
Liyajziyahumu Allahu ahsana ma 'amiloo wayazeedahum min fadlihi wallahu yarzuqu man yashao bighayri hisab
Wallatheena kafaroo a'maluhum kasarabin biqee'atin yahsabuhu aththamanu maan hatta itha jaahu lam yajidhu shayan wawajada Allaha 'indahu fawaffahu hisabahu wallahu saree'u alhisab

Aw kathulumatin fee bahrin lujjiyyin yaghshahu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihi sahabun thulumatun ba'duha fawqa ba'din itha akhraja yadahu lam yakad yaraha waman lam yaj'ali Allahu lahu nooran fama lahu min noor
Alam tara anna Allaha yusabbihu lahu man fee assamawati walardi wattayru saffatin kullun qad 'alima salatahu watasbeehahu wallahu 'aleemun bima yaf'aloon
Walillahi mulku assamawati walardi waila Allahi almaseer

Alam tara anna Allaha yuzjee sahaban thumma yuallifu baynahu thumma yaj'aluhu rukaman fatara alwadqa yakhruju min khilalihi wayunazzilu mina assamai min jibalin feeha min baradin fayuseebu bihi man yashao wayasrifuhu 'an man yashao yakadu sana barqihi yathhabu bilabsar
Yuqallibu Allahu allayla wannahara inna fee thalika la'ibratan liolee alabsar

Wallahu khalaqa kulla dabbatin min main faminhum man yamshee 'ala batnihi waminhum man yamshee 'ala rijlayni waminhum man yamshee 'ala arba'in yakhluqu Allahu ma yashao inna Allaha 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Laqad anzalna ayatin mubayyinatin wallahu yahdee man yashao ila siratin mustaqeem
Wayaqooloona amanna billahi wabirrasooli waata'na thumma yatawalla fareequn minhum min ba'di thalika wama olaika bilmumineen
Waitha du'oo ila Allahi warasoolihi liyahkuma baynahum itha fareequn minhum mu'ridoon
Wain yakun lahumu alhaqqu yatoo ilayhi muth'ineen
Afee quloobihim maradun ami irtaboo am yakhafoona an yaheefa Allahu 'alayhim warasooluhu bal olaika humu aththalimoon
Innama kana qawla almumineena itha du'oo ila Allahi warasoolihi liyahkuma baynahum an yaqooloo sami'na waata'na waolaika humu almuflihoon
Waman yuti'i Allaha warasoolahu wayakhsha Allaha wayattaqhi faolaika humu alfaizoon
Waaqsamoo billahi jahda aymanihim lain amartahum layakhrujunna qul la tuqsimoo ta'atun ma'roofatun inna Allaha khabeerun bima ta'maloon
Qul atee'oo Allaha waatee'oo arrasoola fain tawallaw fainnama 'alayhi ma hummila wa'alaykum ma hummiltum wain tutee'oohu tahtadoo wama 'ala arrasooli illa albalaghu almubeen

Wa'ada Allahu allatheena amanoo minkum wa'amiloo assalihati layastakhlifannahum fee alardi kama istakhlafa allatheena min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum deenahumu allathee irtada lahum walayubaddilannahum min ba'di khawfihim amnan ya'budoonanee la yushrikoona bee shayan waman kafara ba'da thalika faolaika humu alfasiqoon
Waaqeemoo assalata waatoo azzakata waatee'oo arrasoola la'allakum turhamoon
La tahsabanna allatheena kafaroo mu'jizeena fee alardi wamawahumu annaru walabisa almaseer

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo liyastathinkumu allatheena malakat aymanukum wallatheena lam yablughoo alhuluma minkum thalatha marratin min qabli salati alfajri waheena tada'oona thiyabakum mina aththaheerati wamin ba'di salati al'ishai thalathu 'awratin lakum laysa 'alaykum wala 'alayhim junahun ba'dahunna tawwafoona 'alaykum ba'dukum 'ala ba'din kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati wallahu 'aleemun hakeem
Waitha balagha alatfalu minkumu alhuluma falyastathinoo kama istathana allatheena min qablihim kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakum ayatihi wallahu 'aleemun hakeem
Walqawa'idu mina annisai allatee la yarjoona nikahan falaysa 'alayhinna junahun an yada'na thiyabahunna ghayra mutabarrijatin bizeenatin waan yasta'fifna khayrun lahunna wallahu samee'un 'aleem

Laysa 'ala ala'ma harajun wala 'ala ala'raji harajun wala 'ala almareedi harajun wala 'ala anfusikum an takuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti abaikum aw buyooti ommahatikum aw buyooti ikhwanikum aw buyooti akhawatikum aw buyooti a'mamikum aw buyooti 'ammatikum aw buyooti akhwalikum aw buyooti khalatikum aw ma malaktum mafatihahu aw sadeeqikum laysa 'alaykum junahun an takuloo jamee'an aw ashtatan faitha dakhaltum buyootan fasallimoo 'ala anfusikum tahiyyatan min 'indi Allahi mubarakatan tayyibatan kathalika yubayyinu Allahu lakumu alayati la'allakum ta'qiloon

Innama almuminoona allatheena amanoo billahi warasoolihi waitha kanoo ma'ahu 'ala amrin jami'in lam yathhaboo hatta yastathinoohu inna allatheena yastathinoonaka olaika allatheena yuminoona billahi warasoolihi faitha istathanooka liba'di shanihim fathan liman shita minhum wastaghfir lahumu Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem

La taj'aloo du'aa arrasooli baynakum kadu'ai ba'dikum ba'dan qad ya'lamu Allahu allatheena yatasallaloona minkum liwathan falyahthari allatheena yukhalifoona 'an amrihi an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum 'athabun aleem
Ala inna lillahi ma fee assamawati walardi qad ya'lamu ma antum 'alayhi wayawma yurja'oona ilayhi fayunabbiohum bima 'amiloo wallahu bikulli shayin 'aleem
Tabaraka allathee nazzala alfurqana 'ala 'abdihi liyakoona lil'alameena natheera
Allathee lahu mulku assamawati walardi walam yattakhith waladan walam yakun lahu shareekun fee almulki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdeera
Wattakhathoo min doonihi alihatan la yakhluqoona shayan wahum yukhlaqoona wala yamlikoona lianfusihim darran wala naf'an wala yamlikoona mawtan wala hayatan wala nushoora
Waqala allatheena kafaroo in hatha illa ifkun iftarahu waa'anahu 'alayhi qawmun akharoona faqad jaoo thulman wazoora
Waqaloo asateeru alawwaleena iktatabaha fahiya tumla 'alayhi bukratan waaseela
Qul anzalahu allathee ya'lamu assirra fee assamawati walardi innahu kana ghafooran raheema
Waqaloo mali hatha arrasooli yakulu atta'ama wayamshee fee alaswaqi lawla onzila ilayhi malakun fayakoona ma'ahu natheera
Aw yulqa ilayhi kanzun aw takoonu lahu jannatun yakulu minha waqala aththalimoona in tattabi'oona illa rajulan mashoora
Onthur kayfa daraboo laka alamthala fadalloo fala yastatee'oona sabeela
Tabaraka allathee in shaa ja'ala laka khayran min thalika jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wayaj'al laka qusoora
Bal kaththaboo bissa'ati waa'tadna liman kaththaba bissa'ati sa'eera
Itha raathum min makanin ba'eedin sami'oo laha taghayyuthan wazafeera
Waitha olqoo minha makanan dayyiqan muqarraneena da'aw hunalika thuboora
La tad'oo alyawma thubooran wahidan wad'oo thubooran katheera
Qul athalika khayrun am jannatu alkhuldi allatee wu'ida almuttaqoona kanat lahum jazaan wamaseera
Lahum feeha ma yashaoona khalideena kana 'ala rabbika wa'dan masoola
Wayawma yahshuruhum wama ya'budoona min dooni Allahi fayaqoolu aantum adlaltum 'ibadee haolai am hum dalloo assabeel
Qaloo subhanaka ma kana yanbaghee lana an nattakhitha min doonika min awliyaa walakin matta'tahum waabaahum hatta nasoo aththikra wakanoo qawman boora
Faqad kaththabookum bima taqooloona fama tastatee'oona sarfan wala nasran waman yathlim minkum nuthiqhu 'athaban kabeera
Wama arsalna qablaka mina almursaleena illa innahum layakuloona atta'ama wayamshoona fee alaswaqi waja'alna ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroona wakana rabbuka baseera
Waqala allatheena la yarjoona liqaana lawla onzila 'alayna almalaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi istakbaroo fee anfusihim wa'ataw 'utuwwan kabeera
Yawma yarawna almalaikata la bushra yawmaithin lilmujrimeena wayaqooloona hijran mahjoora
Waqadimna ila ma 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnahu habaan manthoora
Ashabu aljannati yawmaithin khayrun mustaqarran waahsanu maqeela
Wayawma tashaqqaqu assamao bilghamami wanuzzila almalaikatu tanzeela
Almulku yawmaithin alhaqqu lirrahmani wakana yawman 'ala alkafireena 'aseera
Wayawma ya'addu aththalimu 'ala yadayhi yaqoolu ya laytanee ittakhathtu ma'a arrasooli sabeela
Ya waylata laytanee lam attakhith fulanan khaleela
Laqad adallanee 'ani aththikri ba'da ith jaanee wakana ashshaytanu lilinsani khathoola
Waqala arrasoolu ya rabbi inna qawmee ittakhathoo hatha alqurana mahjoora
Wakathalika ja'alna likulli nabiyyin 'aduwwan mina almujrimeena wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanaseera
Waqala allatheena kafaroo lawla nuzzila 'alayhi alquranu jumlatan wahidatan kathalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tarteela
Wala yatoonaka bimathalin illa jinaka bilhaqqi waahsana tafseera
Allatheena yuhsharoona 'ala wujoohihim ila jahannama olaika sharrun makanan waadallu sabeela
Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba waja'alna ma'ahu akhahu haroona wazeera
Faqulna ithhaba ila alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayatina fadammarnahum tadmeera
Waqawma noohin lamma kaththaboo arrusula aghraqnahum waja'alnahum linnasi ayatan waa'tadna liththalimeena 'athaban aleema
Wa'adan wathamooda waashaba arrassi waquroonan bayna thalika katheera
Wakullan darabna lahu alamthala wakullan tabbarna tatbeera
Walaqad ataw 'ala alqaryati allatee omtirat matara assawi afalam yakoonoo yarawnaha bal kanoo la yarjoona nushoora
Waitha raawka in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahatha allathee ba'atha Allahu rasoola
In kada layudilluna 'an alihatina lawla an sabarna 'alayha wasawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawna al'athaba man adallu sabeela
Araayta mani ittakhatha ilahahu hawahu afaanta takoonu 'alayhi wakeela
Am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloona in hum illa kalan'ami bal hum adallu sabeela
Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda aththilla walaw shaa laja'alahu sakinan thumma ja'alna ashshamsa 'alayhi daleela
Thumma qabadnahu ilayna qabdan yaseera
Wahuwa allathee ja'ala lakumu allayla libasan wannawma subatan waja'ala annahara nushoora
Wahuwa allathee arsala arriyaha bushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina assamai maan tahoora
Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytan wanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna an'aman waanasiyya katheera
Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahum liyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu annasi illa kufoora
Walaw shina laba'athna fee kulli qaryatin natheera
Fala tuti'i alkafireena wajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeera
Wahuwa allathee maraja albahrayni hatha 'athbun furatun wahatha milhun ojajun waja'ala baynahuma barzakhan wahijran mahjoora
Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina almai basharan faja'alahu nasaban wasihran wakana rabbuka qadeera
Waya'budoona min dooni Allahi ma la yanfa'uhum wala yadurruhum wakana alkafiru 'ala rabbihi thaheera
Wama arsalnaka illa mubashshiran wanatheera
Qul ma asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin illa man shaa an yattakhitha ila rabbihi sabeela
Watawakkal 'ala alhayyi allathee la yamootu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafa bihi bithunoobi 'ibadihi khabeera
Allathee khalaqa assamawati walarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa 'ala al'arshi arrahmanu fasal bihi khabeera
Waitha qeela lahumu osjudoo lirrahmani qaloo wama arrahmanu anasjudu lima tamuruna wazadahum nufoora
Tabaraka allathee ja'ala fee assamai buroojan waja'ala feeha sirajan waqamaran muneera
Wahuwa allathee ja'ala allayla wannahara khilfatan liman arada an yaththakkara aw arada shukoora
Wa'ibadu arrahmani allatheena yamshoona 'ala alardi hawnan waitha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloo salama
Wallatheena yabeetoona lirabbihim sujjadan waqiyama
Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbana isrif 'anna 'athaba jahannama inna 'athabaha kana gharama
Innaha saat mustaqarran wamuqama
Wallatheena itha anfaqoo lam yusrifoo walam yaqturoo wakana bayna thalika qawama
Wallatheena la yad'oona ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara wala yaqtuloona annafsa allatee harrama Allahu illa bilhaqqi wala yaznoona waman yaf'al thalika yalqa athama
Yuda'af lahu al'athabu yawma alqiyamati wayakhlud feehi muhana
Illa man taba waamana wa'amila 'amalan salihan faolaika yubaddilu Allahu sayyiatihim hasanatin wakana Allahu ghafooran raheema
Waman taba wa'amila salihan fainnahu yatoobu ila Allahi mataba
Wallatheena la yashhadoona azzoora waitha marroo billaghwi marroo kirama
Wallatheena itha thukkiroo biayati rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alayha summan wa'umyana
Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbana hab lana min azwajina wathurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lilmuttaqeena imama
Olaika yujzawna alghurfata bima sabaroo wayulaqqawna feeha tahiyyatan wasalama
Khalideena feeha hasunat mustaqarran wamuqama
Qul ma ya'bao bikum rabbee lawla du'aokum faqad kaththabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizama
Taseenmeem
Tilka ayatu alkitabi almubeen
La'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka alla yakoonoo mumineen
In nasha nunazzil 'alayhim mina assamai ayatan fathallat a'naquhum laha khadi'een
Wama yateehim min thikrin mina arrahmani muhdathin illa kanoo 'anhu mu'rideen
Faqad kaththaboo fasayateehim anbao ma kanoo bihi yastahzioon
Awalam yaraw ila alardi kam anbatna feeha min kulli zawjin kareem
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Waith nada rabbuka moosa ani iti alqawma aththalimeen
Qawma fir'awna ala yattaqoon
Qala rabbi innee akhafu an yukaththiboon
Wayadeequ sadree wala yantaliqu lisanee faarsil ila haroon
Walahum 'alayya thanbun faakhafu an yaqtuloon
Qala kalla fathhaba biayatina inna ma'akum mustami'oon
Fatiya fir'awna faqoola inna rasoolu rabbi al'alameen
An arsil ma'ana banee israeel
Qala alam nurabbika feena waleedan walabithta feena min 'umurika sineen
Wafa'alta fa'lataka allatee fa'alta waanta mina alkafireen
Qala fa'altuha ithan waana mina addalleen
Fafarartu minkum lamma khiftukum fawahaba lee rabbee hukman waja'alanee mina almursaleen
Watilka ni'matun tamunnuha 'alayya an 'abbadta banee israeel
Qala fir'awnu wama rabbu al'alameen
Qala rabbu assamawati walardi wama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineen
Qala liman hawlahu ala tastami'oon
Qala rabbukum warabbu abaikumu alawwaleen
Qala inna rasoolakumu allathee orsila ilaykum lamajnoon
Qala rabbu almashriqi walmaghribi wama baynahuma in kuntum ta'qiloon
Qala laini ittakhathta ilahan ghayree laaj'alannaka mina almasjooneen
Qala awalaw jituka bishayin mubeen
Qala fati bihi in kunta mina assadiqeen
Faalqa 'asahu faitha hiya thu'banun mubeen
Wanaza'a yadahu faitha hiya baydao linnathireen
Qala lilmalai hawlahu inna hatha lasahirun 'aleem
Yureedu an yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihi famatha tamuroon
Qaloo arjih waakhahu wab'ath fee almadaini hashireen
Yatooka bikulli sahharin 'aleem
Fajumi'a assaharatu limeeqati yawmin ma'loom
Waqeela linnasi hal antum mujtami'oon
La'allana nattabi'u assaharata in kanoo humu alghalibeen
Falamma jaa assaharatu qaloo lifir'awna ainna lana laajran in kunna nahnu alghalibeen
Qala na'am wainnakum ithan lamina almuqarrabeen
Qala lahum moosa alqoo ma antum mulqoon
Faalqaw hibalahum wa'isiyyahum waqaloo bi'izzati fir'awna inna lanahnu alghaliboon
Faalqa moosa 'asahu faitha hiya talqafu ma yafikoon
Faolqiya assaharatu sajideen
Qaloo amanna birabbi al'alameen
Rabbi moosa waharoon
Qala amantum lahu qabla an athana lakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee 'allamakumu assihra falasawfa ta'lamoona laoqatti'anna aydiyakum waarjulakum min khilafin walaosallibannakum ajma'een
Qaloo la dayra inna ila rabbina munqaliboon
Inna natma'u an yaghfira lana rabbuna khatayana an kunna awwala almumineen
Waawhayna ila moosa an asri bi'ibadee innakum muttaba'oon
Faarsala fir'awnu fee almadaini hashireen
Inna haolai lashirthimatun qaleeloon
Wainnahum lana laghaithoon
Wainna lajamee'un hathiroon
Faakhrajnahum min jannatin wa'uyoon
Wakunoozin wamaqamin kareem
Kathalika waawrathnaha banee israeel
Faatba'oohum mushriqeen
Falamma taraa aljam'ani qala ashabu moosa inna lamudrakoon
Qala kalla inna ma'iya rabbee sayahdeen
Faawhayna ila moosa ani idrib bi'asaka albahra fanfalaqa fakana kullu firqin kattawdi al'atheem
Waazlafna thamma alakhareen
Waanjayna moosa waman ma'ahu ajma'een
Thumma aghraqna alakhareen
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Watlu 'alayhim nabaa ibraheem
Ith qala liabeehi waqawmihi ma ta'budoon
Qaloo na'budu asnaman fanathallu laha 'akifeen
Qala hal yasma'oonakum ith tad'oon
Aw yanfa'oonakum aw yadurroon
Qaloo bal wajadna abaana kathalika yaf'aloon
Qala afaraaytum ma kuntum ta'budoon
Antum waabaokumu alaqdamoon
Fainnahum 'aduwwun lee illa rabba al'alameen
Allathee khalaqanee fahuwa yahdeen
Wallathee huwa yut'imunee wayasqeen
Waitha maridtu fahuwa yashfeen
Wallathee yumeetunee thumma yuhyeen
Wallathee atma'u an yaghfira lee khateeatee yawma addeen
Rabbi hab lee hukman waalhiqnee bissaliheen
Waj'al lee lisana sidqin fee alakhireen
Waj'alnee min warathati jannati anna'eem
Waghfir liabee innahu kana mina addalleen
Wala tukhzinee yawma yub'athoon
Yawma la yanfa'u malun wala banoon
Illa man ata Allaha biqalbin saleem
Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeen
Waburrizati aljaheemu lilghaween
Waqeela lahum ayna ma kuntum ta'budoon
Min dooni Allahi hal yansuroonakum aw yantasiroon
Fakubkiboo feeha hum walghawoon
Wajunoodu ibleesa ajma'oon
Qaloo wahum feeha yakhtasimoon
Tallahi in kunna lafee dalalin mubeen
Ith nusawweekum birabbi al'alameen
Wama adallana illa almujrimoon
Fama lana min shafi'een
Wala sadeeqin hameem
Falaw anna lana karratan fanakoona mina almumineen
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Kaththabat qawmu noohin almursaleen
Ith qala lahum akhoohum noohun ala tattaqoon
Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wama asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa 'ala rabbi al'alameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Qaloo anuminu laka wattaba'aka alarthaloon
Qala wama 'ilmee bima kanoo ya'maloon
In hisabuhum illa 'ala rabbee law tash'uroon
Wama ana bitaridi almumineen
In ana illa natheerun mubeen
Qaloo lain lam tantahi ya noohu latakoonanna mina almarjoomeen
Qala rabbi inna qawmee kaththaboon
Faftah baynee wabaynahum fathan wanajjinee waman ma'iya mina almumineen
Faanjaynahu waman ma'ahu fee alfulki almashhoon
Thumma aghraqna ba'du albaqeen
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Kaththabat 'adun almursaleen
Ith qala lahum akhoohum hoodun ala tattaqoon
Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wama asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa 'ala rabbi al'alameen
Atabnoona bikulli ree'in ayatan ta'bathoon
Watattakhithoona masani'a la'allakum takhludoon
Waitha batashtum batashtum jabbareen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wattaqoo allathee amaddakum bima ta'lamoon
Amaddakum bian'amin wabaneen
Wajannatin wa'uyoon
Innee akhafu 'alaykum 'athaba yawmin 'atheem
Qaloo sawaon 'alayna awa'athta am lam takun mina alwa'itheen
In hatha illa khuluqu alawwaleen
Wama nahnu bimu'aththabeen
Fakaththaboohu faahlaknahum inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Kaththabat thamoodu almursaleen
Ith qala lahum akhoohum salihun ala tattaqoon
Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wama asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa 'ala rabbi al'alameen
Atutrakoona fee ma hahuna amineen
Fee jannatin wa'uyoon
Wazuroo'in wanakhlin tal'uha hadeem
Watanhitoona mina aljibali buyootan fariheen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wala tutee'oo amra almusrifeen
Allatheena yufsidoona fee alardi wala yuslihoon
Qaloo innama anta mina almusahhareen
Ma anta illa basharun mithluna fati biayatin in kunta mina assadiqeena
Qala hathihi naqatun laha shirbun walakum shirbu yawmin ma'loom
Wala tamassooha bisooin fayakhuthakum 'athabu yawmin 'atheem
Fa'aqarooha faasbahoo nadimeen
Faakhathahumu al'athabu inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Kaththabat qawmu lootin almursaleen
Ith qala lahum akhoohum lootun ala tattaqoon
Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wama asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa 'ala rabbi al'alameen
Atatoona aththukrana mina al'alameen
Watatharoona ma khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwajikum bal antum qawmun 'adoon
Qaloo lain lam tantahi ya lootu latakoonanna mina almukhrajeen
Qala innee li'amalikum mina alqaleen
Rabbi najjinee waahlee mimma ya'maloon
Fanajjaynahu waahlahu ajma'een
Illa 'ajoozan fee alghabireen
Thumma dammarna alakhareen
Waamtarna 'alayhim mataran fasaa mataru almunthareen
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Kaththaba ashabu alaykati almursaleen
Ith qala lahum shu'aybun ala tattaqoon
Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Wama asalukum 'alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa 'ala rabbi al'alameen
Awfoo alkayla wala takoonoo mina almukhsireen
Wazinoo bilqistasi almustaqeem
Wala tabkhasoo annasa ashyaahum wala ta'thaw fee alardi mufsideen
Wattaqoo allathee khalaqakum waljibillata alawwaleen
Qaloo innama anta mina almusahhareen
Wama anta illa basharun mithluna wain nathunnuka lamina alkathibeen
Faasqit 'alayna kisafan mina assamai in kunta mina assadiqeen
Qala rabbee a'lamu bima ta'maloon
Fakaththaboohu faakhathahum 'athabu yawmi aththullati innahu kana 'athaba yawmin 'atheem
Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineen
Wainna rabbaka lahuwa al'azeezu arraheem
Wainnahu latanzeelu rabbi al'alameen
Nazala bihi arroohu alameen
'ala qalbika litakoona mina almunthireen
Bilisanin 'arabiyyin mubeen
Wainnahu lafee zuburi alawwaleen
Awalam yakun lahum ayatan an ya'lamahu 'ulamao banee israeel
Walaw nazzalnahu 'ala ba'di ala'jameen
Faqaraahu 'alayhim ma kanoo bihi mumineen
Kathalika salaknahu fee quloobi almujrimeen
La yuminoona bihi hatta yarawoo al'athaba alaleem
Fayatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uroon
Fayaqooloo hal nahnu muntharoon
Afabi'athabina yasta'jiloon
Afaraayta in matta'nahum sineen
Thumma jaahum ma kanoo yoo'adoon
Ma aghna 'anhum ma kanoo yumatta'oon
Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illa laha munthiroon
Thikra wama kunna thalimeen
Wama tanazzalat bihi ashshayateen
Wama yanbaghee lahum wama yastatee'oon
Innahum 'ani assam'i lama'zooloona
Fala tad'u ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara fatakoona mina almu'aththabeen
Waanthir 'asheerataka alaqrabeen
Wakhfid janahaka limani ittaba'aka mina almumineen
Fain 'asawka faqul innee bareeon mimma ta'maloon
Watawakkal 'ala al'azeezi arraheem
Allathee yaraka heena taqoom
Wataqallubaka fee assajideen
Innahu huwa assamee'u al'aleem
Hal onabbiokum 'ala man tanazzalu ashshayateen
Tanazzalu 'ala kulli affakin atheem
Yulqoona assam'a waaktharuhum kathiboon
Washshu'arao yattabi'uhumu alghawoon
Alam tara annahum fee kulli wadin yaheemoon
Waannahum yaqooloona ma la yaf'aloon
Illa allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati wathakaroo Allaha katheeran wantasaroo min ba'di ma thulimoo wasaya'lamu allatheena thalamoo ayya munqalabin yanqaliboon
Taseen tilka ayatu alqurani wakitabin mubeen
Hudan wabushra lilmumineen
Allatheena yuqeemoona assalata wayutoona azzakata wahum bilakhirati hum yooqinoon
Inna allatheena la yuminoona bilakhirati zayyanna lahum a'malahum fahum ya'mahoon
Olaika allatheena lahum sooo al'athabi wahum fee alakhirati humu alakhsaroon
Wainnaka latulaqqa alqurana min ladun hakeemin 'aleem
Ith qala moosa liahlihi innee anastu naran saateekum minha bikhabarin aw ateekum bishihabin qabasin la'allakum tastaloon
Falamma jaaha noodiya an boorika man fee annari waman hawlaha wasubhana Allahi rabbi al'alameen
Ya moosa innahu ana Allahu al'azeezu alhakeem
Waalqi 'asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiran walam yu'aqqib ya moosa la takhaf innee la yakhafu ladayya almursaloon
Illa man thalama thumma baddala husnan ba'da sooin fainnee ghafoorun raheem
Waadkhil yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri sooin fee tis'i ayatin ila fir'awna waqawmihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
Falamma jaathum ayatuna mubsiratan qaloo hatha sihrun mubeen
Wajahadoo biha wastayqanatha anfusuhum thulman wa'uluwwan fanthur kayfa kana 'aqibatu almufsideen
Walaqad atayna dawooda wasulaymana 'ilman waqala alhamdu lillahi allathee faddalana 'ala katheerin min 'ibadihi almumineen
Wawaritha sulaymanu dawooda waqala ya ayyuha annasu 'ullimna mantiqa attayri waooteena min kulli shayin inna hatha lahuwa alfadlu almubeen
Wahushira lisulaymana junooduhu mina aljinni walinsi wattayri fahum yooza'oon
Hatta itha ataw 'ala wadi annamli qalat namlatun ya ayyuha annamlu odkhuloo masakinakum la yahtimannakum sulaymanu wajunooduhu wahum la yash'uroon
Fatabassama dahikan min qawliha waqala rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mataka allatee an'amta 'alayya wa'ala walidayya waan a'mala salihan tardahu waadkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibadika assaliheen
Watafaqqada attayra faqala ma liya la ara alhudhuda am kana mina alghaibeen
Lao'aththibannahu 'athaban shadeedan aw laathbahannahu aw layatiyannee bisultanin mubeen
Famakatha ghayra ba'eedin faqala ahattu bima lam tuhit bihi wajituka min sabain binabain yaqeen
Innee wajadtu imraatan tamlikuhum waootiyat min kulli shayin walaha 'arshun 'atheem
Wajadtuha waqawmaha yasjudoona lishshamsi min dooni Allahi wazayyana lahumu ashshaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum 'ani assabeeli fahum la yahtadoon
Alla yasjudoo lillahi allathee yukhriju alkhabaa fee assamawati walardi waya'lamu ma tukhfoona wama tu'linoon
Allahu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al'arshi al'atheem
Qala sananthuru asadaqta am kunta mina alkathibeen
Ithhab bikitabee hatha faalqih ilayhim thumma tawalla 'anhum fanthur matha yarji'oon
Qalat ya ayyuha almalao innee olqiya ilayya kitabun kareem
Innahu min sulaymana wainnahu bismi Allahi arrahmani arraheem
Alla ta'loo 'alayya watoonee muslimeen
Qalat ya ayyuha almalao aftoonee fee amree ma kuntu qati'atan amran hatta tashhadoon
Qaloo nahnu oloo quwwatin waoloo basin shadeedin walamru ilayki fanthuree matha tamureen
Qalat inna almulooka itha dakhaloo qaryatan afsadooha waja'aloo a'izzata ahliha athillatan wakathalika yaf'aloon
Wainnee mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanathiratun bima yarji'u almursaloon
Falamma jaa sulaymana qala atumiddoonani bimalin fama ataniya Allahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafrahoon
Irji' ilayhim falanatiyannahum bijunoodin la qibala lahum biha walanukhrijannahum minha athillatan wahum saghiroon
Qala ya ayyuha almalao ayyukum yateenee bi'arshiha qabla an yatoonee muslimeen
Qala 'ifreetun mina aljinni ana ateeka bihi qabla an taqooma min maqamika wainne 'alayhi laqawiyyun ameen

Qala allathee 'indahu 'ilmun mina alkitabi ana ateeka bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahu mustaqirran 'indahu qala hatha min fadli rabbee liyabluwanee aashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fainnama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fainna rabbee ghaniyyun kareem
Qala nakkiroo laha 'arshaha nanthur atahtadee am takoonu mina allatheena la yahtadoon
Falamma jaat qeela ahakatha 'arshuki qalat kaannahu huwa waooteena al'ilma min qabliha wakunna muslimeen
Wasaddaha ma kanat ta'budu min dooni Allahi innaha kanat min qawmin kafireen

Qeela laha odkhulee assarha falamma raathu hasibathu lujjatan wakashafat 'an saqayha qala innahu sarhun mumarradun min qawareera qalat rabbi innee thalamtu nafsee waaslamtu ma'a sulaymana lillahi rabbi al'alameen
Walaqad arsalna ila thamooda akhahum salihan ani o'budoo Allaha faitha hum fareeqani yakhtasimoon
Qala ya qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissayyiati qabla alhasanati lawla tastaghfiroona Allaha la'allakum turhamoon
Qaloo ittayyarna bika wabiman ma'aka qala tairukum 'inda Allahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoon
Wakana fee almadeenati tis'atu rahtin yufsidoona fee alardi wala yuslihoon
Qaloo taqasamoo billahi lanubayyitannahu waahlahu thumma lanaqoolanna liwaliyyihi ma shahidna mahlika ahlihi wainna lasadiqoon
Wamakaroo makran wamakarna makran wahum la yash'uroon
Fanthur kayfa kana 'aqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahum waqawmahum ajma'een
Fatilka buyootuhum khawiyatan bima thalamoo inna fee thalika laayatan liqawmin ya'lamoon
Waanjayna allatheena amanoo wakanoo yattaqoon
Walootan ith qala liqawmihi atatoona alfahishata waantum tubsiroon
Ainnakum latatoona arrijala shahwatan min dooni annisai bal antum qawmun tajhaloon
Fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo akhrijoo ala lootin min qaryatikum innahum onasun yatatahharoon
Faanjaynahu waahlahu illa imraatahu qaddarnaha mina alghabireen
Waamtarna 'alayhim mataran fasaa mataru almunthareen
Quli alhamdu lillahi wasalamun 'ala 'ibadihi allatheena istafa allahu khayrun amma yushrikoon
Amman khalaqa assamawati walarda waanzala lakum mina assamai maan faanbatna bihi hadaiqa thata bahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitoo shajaraha ailahun ma'a Allahi bal hum qawmun ya'diloon
Amman ja'ala alarda qararan waja'ala khilalaha anharan waja'ala laha rawasiya waja'ala bayna albahrayni hajizan ailahun ma'a Allahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamoon
Amman yujeebu almudtarra itha da'ahu wayakshifu assooa wayaj'alukum khulafaa alardi ailahun ma'a Allahi qaleelan ma tathakkaroon
Amman yahdeekum fee thulumati albarri walbahri waman yursilu arriyaha bushran bayna yaday rahmatihi ailahun ma'a Allahi ta'ala Allahu 'amma yushrikoon
Amman yabdao alkhalqa thumma yu'eeduhu waman yarzuqukum mina assamai walardi ailahun ma'a Allahi qul hatoo burhanakum in kuntum sadiqeen
Qul la ya'lamu man fee assamawati walardi alghayba illa Allahu wama yash'uroona ayyana yub'athoon
Bali iddaraka 'ilmuhum fee alakhirati bal hum fee shakkin minha bal hum minha 'amoon
Waqala allatheena kafaroo aitha kunna turaban waabaona ainna lamukhrajoon
Laqad wu'idna hatha nahnu waabaona min qablu in hatha illa asateeru alawwaleen
Qul seeroo fee alardi fanthuroo kayfa kana 'aqibatu almujrimeen
Wala tahzan 'alayhim wala takun fee dayqin mimma yamkuroon
Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwa'du in kuntum sadiqeen
Qul 'asa an yakoona radifa lakum ba'du allathee tasta'jiloon
Wainna rabbaka lathoo fadlin 'ala annasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuroon
Wainna rabbaka laya'lamu ma tukinnu sudooruhum wama yu'linoon
Wama min ghaibatin fee assamai walardi illa fee kitabin mubeen
Inna hatha alqurana yaqussu 'ala banee israeela akthara allathee hum feehi yakhtalifoon
Wainnahu lahudan warahmatun lilmumineen
Inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum bihukmihi wahuwa al'azeezu al'aleem
Fatawakkal 'ala Allahi innaka 'ala alhaqqi almubeen
Innaka la tusmi'u almawta wala tusmi'u assumma addu'aa itha wallaw mudbireen
Wama anta bihadee al'umyi 'an dalalatihim in tusmi'u illa man yuminu biayatina fahum muslimoon
Waitha waqa'a alqawlu 'alayhim akhrajna lahum dabbatan mina alardi tukallimuhum anna annasa kanoo biayatina la yooqinoon
Wayawma nahshuru min kulli ommatin fawjan mimman yukaththibu biayatina fahum yooza'oon
Hatta itha jaoo qala akaththabtum biayatee walam tuheetoo biha 'ilman ammatha kuntum ta'maloon
Wawaqa'a alqawlu 'alayhim bima thalamoo fahum la yantiqoon
Alam yaraw anna ja'alna allayla liyaskunoo feehi wannahara mubsiran inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoon
Wayawma yunfakhu fee assoori fafazi'a man fee assamawati waman fee alardi illa man shaa Allahu wakullun atawhu dakhireen
Watara aljibala tahsabuha jamidatan wahiya tamurru marra assahabi sun'a Allahi allathee atqana kulla shayin innahu khabeerun bima taf'aloon
Man jaa bilhasanati falahu khayrun minha wahum min faza'in yawmaithin aminoon
Waman jaa bissayyiati fakubbat wujoohuhum fee annari hal tujzawna illa ma kuntum ta'maloon
Innama omirtu an a'buda rabba hathihi albaldati allathee harramaha walahu kullu shayin waomirtu an akoona mina almuslimeen
Waan atluwa alqurana famani ihtada fainnama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla faqul innama ana mina almunthireen
Waquli alhamdu lillahi sayureekum ayatihi fata'rifoonaha wama rabbuka bighafilin 'amma ta'maloon
Taseenmeem
Tilka ayatu alkitabi almubeen
Natloo 'alayka min nabai moosa wafir'awna bilhaqqi liqawmin yuminoon
Inna fir'awna 'ala fee alardi waja'ala ahlaha shiya'an yastad'ifu taifatan minhum yuthabbihu abnaahum wayastahyee nisaahum innahu kana mina almufsideen
Wanureedu an namunna 'ala allatheena istud'ifoo fee alardi wanaj'alahum aimmatan wanaj'alahumu alwaritheen
Wanumakkina lahum fee alardi wanuriya fir'awna wahamana wajunoodahuma minhum ma kanoo yahtharoon
Waawhayna ila ommi moosa an ardi'eehi faitha khifti 'alayhi faalqeehi fee alyammi wala takhafee wala tahzanee inna raddoohu ilayki waja'iloohu mina almursaleen
Faltaqatahu alu fir'awna liyakoona lahum 'aduwwan wahazanan inna fir'awna wahamana wajunoodahuma kanoo khatieen
Waqalati imraatu fir'awna qurratu 'aynin lee walaka la taqtuloohu 'asa an yanfa'ana aw nattakhithahu waladan wahum la yash'uroon
Waasbaha fuadu ommi moosa farighan in kadat latubdee bihi lawla an rabatna 'ala qalbiha litakoona mina almumineen
Waqalat liokhtihi qusseehi fabasurat bihi 'an junubin wahum la yash'uroon
Waharramna 'alayhi almaradi'a min qablu faqalat hal adullukum 'ala ahli baytin yakfuloonahu lakum wahum lahu nasihoon
Faradadnahu ila ommihi kay taqarra 'aynuha wala tahzana walita'lama anna wa'da Allahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamoon
Walamma balagha ashuddahu wastawa ataynahu hukman wa'ilman wakathalika najzee almuhsineen

Wadakhala almadeenata 'ala heeni ghaflatin min ahliha fawajada feeha rajulayni yaqtatilani hatha min shee'atihi wahatha min 'aduwwihi fastaghathahu allathee min shee'atihi 'ala allathee min 'aduwwihi fawakazahu moosa faqada 'alayhi qala hatha min 'amali ashshaytani innahu 'aduwwun mudillun mubeen
Qala rabbi innee thalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooru arraheem
Qala rabbi bima an'amta 'alayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeen
Faasbaha fee almadeenati khaifan yataraqqabu faitha allathee istansarahu bilamsi yastasrikhuhu qala lahu moosa innaka laghawiyyun mubeen

Falamma an arada an yabtisha billathee huwa 'aduwwun lahuma qala ya moosa atureedu an taqtulanee kama qatalta nafsan bilamsi in tureedu illa an takoona jabbaran fee alardi wama tureedu an takoona mina almusliheen
Wajaa rajulun min aqsa almadeenati yas'a qala ya moosa inna almalaa yatamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka mina annasiheen
Fakharaja minha khaifan yataraqqabu qala rabbi najjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen
Walamma tawajjaha tilqaa madyana qala 'asa rabbee an yahdiyanee sawaa assabeel
Walamma warada maa madyana wajada 'alayhi ommatan mina annasi yasqoona wawajada min doonihimu imraatayni tathoodani qala ma khatbukuma qalata la nasqee hatta yusdira arri'ao waaboona shaykhun kabeer
Fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila aththilli faqala rabbi innee lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeer
Fajaathu ihdahuma tamshee 'ala istihyain qalat inna abee yad'ooka liyajziyaka ajra ma saqayta lana falamma jaahu waqassa 'alayhi alqasasa qala la takhaf najawta mina alqawmi aththalimeen
Qalat ihdahuma ya abati istajirhu inna khayra mani istajarta alqawiyyu alameen
Qala innee oreedu an onkihaka ihda ibnatayya hatayni 'ala an tajuranee thamaniya hijajin fain atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika wama oreedu an ashuqqa 'alayka satajidunee in shaa Allahu mina assaliheen
Qala thalika baynee wabaynaka ayyama alajalayni qadaytu fala 'udwana 'alayya wallahu 'ala ma naqoolu wakeel
Falamma qada moosaalajala wasara biahlihi anasa min janibi attoori naran qala liahlihi omkuthoo innee anastu naran la'allee ateekum minha bikhabarin aw jathwatin mina annari la'allakum tastaloon
Falamma ataha noodiya min shatii alwadi alaymani fee albuq'ati almubarakati mina ashshajarati an ya moosa innee ana Allahu rabbu al'alameen
Waan alqi 'asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiran walam yu'aqqib ya moosa aqbil wala takhaf innaka mina alamineen
Osluk yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri sooin wadmum ilayka janahaka mina arrahbi fathanika burhanani min rabbika ila fir'awna wamalaihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
Qala rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan faakhafu an yaqtuloon
Waakhee haroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisanan faarsilhu ma'iya ridan yusaddiqunee innee akhafu an yukaththiboon
Qala sanashuddu 'adudaka biakheeka wanaj'alu lakuma sultanan fala yasiloona ilaykuma biayatina antuma wamani ittaba'akuma alghaliboon
Falamma jaahum moosa biayatina bayyinatin qaloo ma hatha illa sihrun muftaran wama sami'na bihatha fee abaina alawwaleen
Waqala moosa rabbee a'lamu biman jaa bilhuda min 'indihi waman takoonu lahu 'aqibatu addari innahu la yuflihu aththalimoon
Waqala fir'awnu ya ayyuha almalao ma 'alimtu lakum min ilahin ghayree faawqid lee ya hamanu 'ala atteeni faj'al lee sarhan la'allee attali'u ila ilahi moosa wainnee laathunnuhu mina alkathibeen
Wastakbara huwa wajunooduhu fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi wathannoo annahum ilayna la yurja'oon
Faakhathnahu wajunoodahu fanabathnahum fee alyammi fanthur kayfa kana 'aqibatu aththalimeen
Waja'alnahum aimmatan yad'oona ila annari wayawma alqiyamati la yunsaroon
Waatba'nahum fee hathihi addunya la'natan wayawma alqiyamati hum mina almaqbooheen
Walaqad atayna moosa alkitaba min ba'di ma ahlakna alquroona aloola basaira linnasi wahudan warahmatan la'allahum yatathakkaroon
Wama kunta bijanibi algharbiyyi ith qadayna ila moosa alamra wama kunta mina ashshahideen
Walakinna anshana quroonan fatatawala 'alayhimu al'umuru wama kunta thawiyan fee ahli madyana tatloo 'alayhim ayatina walakinna kunna mursileen
Wama kunta bijanibi attoori ith nadayna walakin rahmatan min rabbika litunthira qawman ma atahum min natheerin min qablika la'allahum yatathakkaroon
Walawla an tuseebahum museebatun bima qaddamat aydeehim fayaqooloo rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasoolan fanattabi'a ayatika wanakoona mina almumineen
Falamma jaahumu alhaqqu min 'indina qaloo lawla ootiya mithla ma ootiya moosa awalam yakfuroo bima ootiya moosa min qablu qaloo sihrani tathahara waqaloo inna bikullin kafiroon
Qul fatoo bikitabin min 'indi Allahi huwa ahda minhuma attabi'hu in kuntum sadiqeen
Fain lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annama yattabi'oona ahwaahum waman adallu mimmani ittaba'a hawahu bighayri hudan mina Allahi inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma aththalimeen
Walaqad wassalna lahumu alqawla la'allahum yatathakkaroon
Allatheena ataynahumu alkitaba min qablihi hum bihi yuminoon
Waitha yutla 'alayhim qaloo amanna bihi innahu alhaqqu min rabbina inna kunna min qablihi muslimeen
Olaika yutawna ajrahum marratayni bima sabaroo wayadraoona bilhasanati assayyiata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon
Waitha sami'oo allaghwa a'radoo 'anhu waqaloo lana a'maluna walakum a'malukum salamun 'alaykum la nabtaghee aljahileen
Innaka la tahdee man ahbabta walakinna Allaha yahdee man yashao wahuwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
Waqaloo in nattabi'i alhuda ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardina awalam numakkin lahum haraman aminan yujba ilayhi thamaratu kulli shayin rizqan min ladunna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamoon
Wakam ahlakna min qaryatin batirat ma'eeshataha fatilka masakinuhum lam tuskan min ba'dihim illa qaleelan wakunna nahnu alwaritheen
Wama kana rabbuka muhlika alqura hatta yab'atha fee ommiha rasoolan yatloo 'alayhim ayatina wama kunna muhlikee alqura illa waahluha thalimoon
Wama ooteetum min shayin famata'u alhayati addunya wazeenatuha wama 'inda Allahi khayrun waabqa afala ta'qiloon
Afaman wa'adnahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laqeehi kaman matta'nahu mata'a alhayati addunya thumma huwa yawma alqiyamati mina almuhdareen
Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu ayna shurakaiya allatheena kuntum taz'umoon
Qala allatheena haqqa 'alayhimu alqawlu rabbana haolai allatheena aghwayna aghwaynahum kama ghawayna tabarrana ilayka ma kanoo iyyana ya'budoon
Waqeela od'oo shurakaakum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum waraawoo al'athaba law annahum kanoo yahtadoon
Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu matha ajabtumu almursaleen
Fa'amiyat 'alayhimu alanbao yawmaithin fahum la yatasaaloon
Faamma man taba waamana wa'amila salihan fa'asa an yakoona mina almufliheen
Warabbuka yakhluqu ma yashao wayakhtaru ma kana lahumu alkhiyaratu subhana Allahi wata'ala 'amma yushrikoon
Warabbuka ya'lamu ma tukinnu sudooruhum wama yu'linoon
Wahuwa Allahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu alhamdu fee aloola walakhirati walahu alhukmu wailayhi turja'oon
Qul araaytum in ja'ala Allahu 'alaykumu allayla sarmadan ila yawmi alqiyamati man ilahun ghayru Allahi yateekum bidiyain afala tasma'oon
Qul araaytum in ja'ala Allahu 'alaykumu annahara sarmadan ila yawmi alqiyamati man ilahun ghayru Allahi yateekum bilaylin taskunoona feehi afala tubsiroon
Wamin rahmatihi ja'ala lakumu allayla wannahara litaskunoo feehi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuroon
Wayawma yunadeehim fayaqoolu ayna shurakaiya allatheena kuntum taz'umoon
Wanaza'na min kulli ommatin shaheedan faqulna hatoo burhanakum fa'alimoo anna alhaqqa lillahi wadalla 'anhum ma kanoo yaftaroon
Inna qaroona kana min qawmi moosa fabagha 'alayhim waataynahu mina alkunoozi ma inna mafatihahu latanooo bil'usbati olee alquwwati ith qala lahu qawmuhu la tafrah inna Allaha la yuhibbu alfariheen
Wabtaghi feema ataka Allahu addara alakhirata wala tansa naseebaka mina addunya waahsin kama ahsana Allahu ilayka wala tabghi alfasada fee alardi inna Allaha la yuhibbu almufsideen
Qala innama ooteetuhu 'ala 'ilmin 'indee awalam ya'lam anna Allaha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina alqurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatan waaktharu jam'an wala yusalu 'an thunoobihimu almujrimoon
Fakharaja 'ala qawmihi fee zeenatihi qala allatheena yureedoona alhayata addunya ya layta lana mithla ma ootiya qaroonu innahu lathoo haththin 'atheem
Waqala allatheena ootoo al'ilma waylakum thawabu Allahi khayrun liman amana wa'amila salihan wala yulaqqaha illa assabiroon
Fakhasafna bihi wabidarihi alarda fama kana lahu min fiatin yansuroonahu min dooni Allahi wama kana mina almuntasireen

Waasbaha allatheena tamannaw makanahu bilamsi yaqooloona waykaanna Allaha yabsutu arrizqa liman yashao min 'ibadihi wayaqdiru lawla an manna Allahu 'alayna lakhasafa bina waykaannahu la yuflihu alkafiroon
Tilka addaru alakhiratu naj'aluha lillatheena la yureedoona 'uluwwan fee alardi wala fasadan wal'aqibatu lilmuttaqeen
Man jaa bilhasanati falahu khayrun minha waman jaa bissayyiati fala yujza allatheena 'amiloo assayyiati illa ma kanoo ya'maloon
Inna allathee farada 'alayka alqurana laradduka ila ma'adin qul rabbee a'lamu man jaa bilhuda waman huwa fee dalalin mubeen
Wama kunta tarjoo an yulqa ilayka alkitabu illa rahmatan min rabbika fala takoonanna thaheeran lilkafireen
Wala yasuddunnaka 'an ayati Allahi ba'da ith onzilat ilayka wad'u ila rabbika wala takoonanna mina almushrikeen
Wala tad'u ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara la ilaha illa huwa kullu shayin halikun illa wajhahu lahu alhukmu wailayhi turja'oon
Aliflammeem
Ahasiba annasu an yutrakoo an yaqooloo amanna wahum la yuftanoon
Walaqad fatanna allatheena min qablihim falaya'lamanna Allahu allatheena sadaqoo walaya'lamanna alkathibeen
Am hasiba allatheena ya'maloona assayyiati an yasbiqoona saa ma yahkumoon
Man kana yarjoo liqaa Allahi fainna ajala Allahi laatin wahuwa assamee'u al'aleem
Waman jahada fainnama yujahidu linafsihi inna Allaha laghaniyyun 'ani al'alameen
Wallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati lanukaffiranna 'anhum sayyiatihim walanajziyannahum ahsana allathee kanoo ya'maloon
Wawassayna alinsana biwalidayhi husnan wain jahadaka litushrika bee ma laysa laka bihi 'ilmun fala tuti'huma ilayya marji'ukum faonabbiokum bima kuntum ta'maloon
Wallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati lanudkhilannahum fee assaliheen

Wamina annasi man yaqoolu amanna billahi faitha oothiya fee Allahi ja'ala fitnata annasi ka'athabi Allahi walain jaa nasrun min rabbika layaqoolunna inna kunna ma'akum awalaysa Allahu bia'lama bima fee sudoori al'alameen
Walaya'lamanna Allahu allatheena amanoo walaya'lamanna almunafiqeen
Waqala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo ittabi'oo sabeelana walnahmil khatayakum wama hum bihamileena min khatayahum min shayin innahum lakathiboon
Walayahmilunna athqalahum waathqalan ma'a athqalihim walayusalunna yawma alqiyamati 'amma kanoo yaftaroon
Walaqad arsalna noohan ila qawmihi falabitha feehim alfa sanatin illa khamseena 'aman faakhathahumu attoofanu wahum thalimoon
Faanjaynahu waashaba assafeenati waja'alnaha ayatan lil'alameen
Waibraheema ith qala liqawmihi o'budoo Allaha wattaqoohu thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

Innama ta'budoona min dooni Allahi awthanan watakhluqoona ifkan inna allatheena ta'budoona min dooni Allahi la yamlikoona lakum rizqan fabtaghoo 'inda Allahi arrizqa wa'budoohu washkuroo lahu ilayhi turja'oon
Wain tukaththiboo faqad kaththaba omamun min qablikum wama 'ala arrasooli illa albalaghu almubeen
Awalam yaraw kayfa yubdio Allahu alkhalqa thumma yu'eeduhu inna thalika 'ala Allahi yaseer
Qul seeroo fee alardi fanthuroo kayfa badaa alkhalqa thumma Allahu yunshio annashata alakhirata inna Allaha 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Yu'aththibu man yashao wayarhamu man yashao wailayhi tuqlaboon
Wama antum bimu'jizeena fee alardi wala fee assamai wama lakum min dooni Allahi min waliyyin wala naseer
Wallatheena kafaroo biayati Allahi waliqaihi olaika yaisoo min rahmatee waolaika lahum 'athabun aleem
Fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo oqtuloohu aw harriqoohu faanjahu Allahu mina annari inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yuminoon

Waqala innama ittakhathtum min dooni Allahi awthanan mawaddata baynikum fee alhayati addunya thumma yawma alqiyamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'din wayal'anu ba'dukum ba'dan wamawakumu annaru wama lakum min nasireen
Faamana lahu lootun waqala innee muhajirun ila rabbee innahu huwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Wawahabna lahu ishaqa waya'qooba waja'alna fee thurriyyatihi annubuwwata walkitaba waataynahu ajrahu fee addunya wainnahu fee alakhirati lamina assaliheen
Walootan ith qala liqawmihi innakum latatoona alfahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al'alameen
Ainnakum latatoona arrijala wataqta'oona assabeela watatoona fee nadeekumu almunkara fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qaloo itina bi'athabi Allahi in kunta mina assadiqeen
Qala rabbi onsurnee 'ala alqawmi almufsideen
Walamma jaat rusuluna ibraheema bilbushra qaloo inna muhlikoo ahli hathihi alqaryati inna ahlaha kanoo thalimeen
Qala inna feeha lootan qaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feeha lanunajjiyannahu waahlahu illa imraatahu kanat mina alghabireen
Walamma an jaat rusuluna lootan seea bihim wadaqa bihim thar'an waqaloo la takhaf wala tahzan inna munajjooka waahlaka illa imraataka kanat mina alghabireen
Inna munziloona 'ala ahli hathihi alqaryati rijzan mina assamai bima kanoo yafsuqoon
Walaqad tarakna minha ayatan bayyinatan liqawmin ya'qiloon
Waila madyana akhahum shu'ayban faqala ya qawmi o'budoo Allaha warjoo alyawma alakhira wala ta'thaw fee alardi mufsideen
Fakaththaboohu faakhathathumu arrajfatu faasbahoo fee darihim jathimeen
Wa'adan wathamooda waqad tabayyana lakum min masakinihim wazayyana lahumu ashshaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum 'ani assabeeli wakanoo mustabsireen
Waqaroona wafir'awna wahamana walaqad jaahum moosa bilbayyinati fastakbaroo fee alardi wama kanoo sabiqeen

Fakullan akhathna bithanbihi faminhum man arsalna 'alayhi hasiban waminhum man akhathathu assayhatu waminhum man khasafna bihi alarda waminhum man aghraqna wama kana Allahu liyathlimahum walakin kanoo anfusahum yathlimoon
Mathalu allatheena ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi awliyaa kamathali al'ankabooti ittakhathat baytan wainna awhana albuyooti labaytu al'ankabooti law kanoo ya'lamoon
Inna Allaha ya'lamu ma yad'oona min doonihi min shayin wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Watilka alamthalu nadribuha linnasi wama ya'qiluha illa al'alimoon
Khalaqa Allahu assamawati walarda bilhaqqi inna fee thalika laayatan lilmumineen
Otlu ma oohiya ilayka mina alkitabi waaqimi assalata inna assalata tanha 'ani alfahshai walmunkari walathikru Allahi akbaru wallahu ya'lamu ma tasna'oon
Wala tujadiloo ahla alkitabi illa billatee hiya ahsanu illa allatheena thalamoo minhum waqooloo amanna billathee onzila ilayna waonzila ilaykum wailahuna wailahukum wahidun wanahnu lahu muslimoon
Wakathalika anzalna ilayka alkitaba fallatheena ataynahumu alkitaba yuminoona bihi wamin haolai man yuminu bihi wama yajhadu biayatina illa alkafiroon
Wama kunta tatloo min qablihi min kitabin wala takhuttuhu biyameenika ithan lartaba almubtiloon
