Walain athaqnahu rahmatan minna min ba'di darraa massathu layaqoolanna hatha lee wama athunnu assa'ata qaimatan walain ruji'tu ila rabbee inna lee 'indahu lalhusna falanunabbianna allatheena kafaroo bima 'amiloo walanutheeqannahum min 'athabin ghaleeth
Waitha an'amna 'ala alinsani a'rada wanaa bijanibihi waitha massahu ashsharru fathoo du'ain 'areed
Qul araaytum in kana min 'indi Allahi thumma kafartum bihi man adallu mimman huwa fee shiqaqin ba'eed
Sanureehim ayatina fee alafaqi wafee anfusihim hatta yatabayyana lahum annahu alhaqqu awalam yakfi birabbika annahu 'ala kulli shayin shaheed
Ala innahum fee miryatin min liqai rabbihim ala innahu bikulli shayin muheet
Hameem
'aynseenqaf
Kathalika yoohee ilayka waila allatheena min qablika Allahu al'azeezu alhakeem
Lahu ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi wahuwa al'aliyyu al'atheem
Takadu assamawatu yatafattarna min fawqihinna walmalaikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi rabbihim wayastaghfiroona liman fee alardi ala inna Allaha huwa alghafooru arraheem
Wallatheena ittakhathoo min doonihi awliyaa Allahu hafeethun 'alayhim wama anta 'alayhim biwakeel
Wakathalika awhayna ilayka quranan 'arabiyyan litunthira omma alqura waman hawlaha watunthira yawma aljam'i la rayba feehi fareequn fee aljannati wafareequn fee assa'eer
Walaw shaa Allahu laja'alahum ommatan wahidatan walakin yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihi waththalimoona ma lahum min waliyyin wala naseer
Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi awliyaa fallahu huwa alwaliyyu wahuwa yuhyee almawta wahuwa 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Wama ikhtalaftum feehi min shayin fahukmuhu ila Allahi thalikumu Allahu rabbee 'alayhi tawakkaltu wailayhi oneeb
Fatiru assamawati walardi ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajan wamina alan'ami azwajan yathraokum feehi laysa kamithlihi shayon wahuwa assamee'u albaseer
Lahu maqaleedu assamawati walardi yabsutu arrizqa liman yashao wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin 'aleem

Shara'a lakum mina addeeni ma wassa bihi noohan wallathee awhayna ilayka wama wassayna bihi ibraheema wamoosa wa'eesa an aqeemoo addeena wala tatafarraqoo feehi kabura 'ala almushrikeena ma tad'oohum ilayhi Allahu yajtabee ilayhi man yashao wayahdee ilayhi man yuneeb

Wama tafarraqoo illa min ba'di ma jaahumu al'ilmu baghyan baynahum walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika ila ajalin musamman laqudiya baynahum wainna allatheena oorithoo alkitaba min ba'dihim lafee shakkin minhu mureeb

Falithalika fad'u wastaqim kama omirta wala tattabi' ahwaahum waqul amantu bima anzala Allahu min kitabin waomirtu lia'dila baynakum Allahu rabbuna warabbukum lana a'maluna walakum a'malukum la hujjata baynana wabaynakumu Allahu yajma'u baynana wailayhi almaseer
Wallatheena yuhajjoona fee Allahi min ba'di ma istujeeba lahu hujjatuhum dahidatun 'inda rabbihim wa'alayhim ghadabun walahum 'athabun shadeed
Allahu allathee anzala alkitaba bilhaqqi walmeezani wama yudreeka la'alla assa'ata qareeb
Yasta'jilu biha allatheena la yuminoona biha wallatheena amanoo mushfiqoona minha waya'lamoona annaha alhaqqu ala inna allatheena yumaroona fee assa'ati lafee dalalin ba'eed
Allahu lateefun bi'ibadihi yarzuqu man yashao wahuwa alqawiyyu al'azeez
Man kana yureedu hartha alakhirati nazid lahu fee harthihi waman kana yureedu hartha addunya nutihi minha wama lahu fee alakhirati min naseeb
Am lahum shurakao shara'oo lahum mina addeeni ma lam yathan bihi Allahu walawla kalimatu alfasli laqudiya baynahum wainna aththalimeena lahum 'athabun aleem
Tara aththalimeena mushfiqeena mimma kasaboo wahuwa waqi'un bihim wallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati fee rawdati aljannati lahum ma yashaoona 'inda rabbihim thalika huwa alfadlu alkabeer

Thalika allathee yubashshiru Allahu 'ibadahu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati qul la asalukum 'alayhi ajran illa almawaddata fee alqurba waman yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahu feeha husnan inna Allaha ghafoorun shakoor
Am yaqooloona iftara 'ala Allahi kathiban fain yashai Allahu yakhtim 'ala qalbika wayamhu Allahu albatila wayuhiqqu alhaqqa bikalimatihi innahu 'aleemun bithati assudoor
Wahuwa allathee yaqbalu attawbata 'an 'ibadihi waya'foo 'ani assayyiati waya'lamu ma taf'aloon
Wayastajeebu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati wayazeeduhum min fadlihi walkafiroona lahum 'athabun shadeed
Walaw basata Allahu arrizqa li'ibadihi labaghaw fee alardi walakin yunazzilu biqadarin ma yashao innahu bi'ibadihi khabeerun baseer
Wahuwa allathee yunazzilu alghaytha min ba'di ma qanatoo wayanshuru rahmatahu wahuwa alwaliyyu alhameed
Wamin ayatihi khalqu assamawati walardi wama baththa feehima min dabbatin wahuwa 'ala jam'ihim itha yashao qadeer
Wama asabakum min museebatin fabima kasabat aydeekum waya'foo 'an katheer
Wama antum bimu'jizeena fee alardi wama lakum min dooni Allahi min waliyyin wala naseer
Wamin ayatihi aljawari fee albahri kala'lam
In yasha yuskini arreeha fayathlalna rawakida 'ala thahrihi inna fee thalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakoor
Aw yoobiqhunna bima kasaboo waya'fu 'an katheer
Waya'lama allatheena yujadiloona fee ayatina ma lahum min mahees
Fama ooteetum min shayin famata'u alhayati addunya wama 'inda Allahi khayrun waabqa lillatheena amanoo wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaloon
Wallatheena yajtaniboona kabaira alithmi walfawahisha waitha ma ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon
Wallatheena istajaboo lirabbihim waaqamoo assalata waamruhum shoora baynahum wamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon
Wallatheena itha asabahumu albaghyu hum yantasiroon
Wajazao sayyiatin sayyiatun mithluha faman 'afa waaslaha faajruhu 'ala Allahi innahu la yuhibbu aththalimeen
Walamani intasara ba'da thulmihi faolaika ma 'alayhim min sabeel
Innama assabeelu 'ala allatheena yathlimoona annasa wayabghoona fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi olaika lahum 'athabun aleem
Walaman sabara waghafara inna thalika lamin 'azmi alomoor
Waman yudlili Allahu fama lahu min waliyyin min ba'dihi watara aththalimeena lamma raawoo al'athaba yaqooloona hal ila maraddin min sabeel

Watarahum yu'radoona 'alayha khashi'eena mina aththulli yanthuroona min tarfin khafiyyin waqala allatheena amanoo inna alkhasireena allatheena khasiroo anfusahum waahleehim yawma alqiyamati ala inna aththalimeena fee 'athabin muqeem
Wama kana lahum min awliyaa yansuroonahum min dooni Allahi waman yudlili Allahu fama lahu min sabeel
Istajeeboo lirabbikum min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina Allahi ma lakum min maljain yawmaithin wama lakum min nakeer
Fain a'radoo fama arsalnaka 'alayhim hafeethan in 'alayka illa albalaghu wainna itha athaqna alinsana minna rahmatan fariha biha wain tusibhum sayyiatun bima qaddamat aydeehim fainna alinsana kafoor
Lillahi mulku assamawati walardi yakhluqu ma yashao yahabu liman yashao inathan wayahabu liman yashao aththukoor
Aw yuzawwijuhum thukranan wainathan wayaj'alu man yashao 'aqeeman innahu 'aleemun qadeer
Wama kana libasharin an yukallimahu Allahu illa wahyan aw min warai hijabin aw yursila rasoolan fayoohiya biithnihi ma yashao innahu 'aliyyun hakeem
Wakathalika awhayna ilayka roohan min amrina ma kunta tadree ma alkitabu wala aleemanu walakin ja'alnahu nooran nahdee bihi man nashao min 'ibadina wainnaka latahdee ila siratin mustaqeem
Sirati Allahi allathee lahu ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi ala ila Allahi taseeru alomoor
Hameem
Walkitabi almubeen
Inna ja'alnahu quranan 'arabiyyan la'allakum ta'qiloona
Wainnahu fee ommi alkitabi ladayna la'aliyyun hakeem
Afanadribu 'ankumu aththikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
Wakam arsalna min nabiyyin fee alawwaleen
Wama yateehim min nabiyyin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioon
Faahlakna ashadda minhum batshan wamada mathalu alawwaleen
Walain saaltahum man khalaqa assamawati walarda layaqoolunna khalaqahunna al'azeezu al'aleem
Allathee ja'ala lakumu alarda mahdan waja'ala lakum feeha subulan la'allakum tahtadoon
Wallathee nazzala mina assamai maan biqadarin faansharna bihi baldatan maytan kathalika tukhrajoon
Wallathee khalaqa alazwaja kullaha waja'ala lakum mina alfulki walan'ami ma tarkaboon
Litastawoo 'ala thuhoorihi thumma tathkuroo ni'mata rabbikum itha istawaytum 'alayhi wataqooloo subhana allathee sakhkhara lana hatha wama kunna lahu muqrineen
Wainna ila rabbina lamunqaliboon
Waja'aloo lahu min 'ibadihi juzan inna alinsana lakafoorun mubeen
Ami ittakhatha mimma yakhluqu banatin waasfakum bilbaneen
Waitha bushshira ahaduhum bima daraba lirrahmani mathalan thalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa katheem
Awaman yunashshao fee alhilyati wahuwa fee alkhisami ghayru mubeen
Waja'aloo almalaikata allatheena hum 'ibadu arrahmani inathan ashahidoo khalqahum satuktabu shahadatuhum wayusaloon
Waqaloo law shaa arrahmanu ma 'abadnahum ma lahum bithalika min 'ilmin in hum illa yakhrusoon
Am ataynahum kitaban min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikoon
Bal qaloo inna wajadna abaana 'ala ommatin wainna 'ala atharihim muhtadoon
Wakathalika ma arsalna min qablika fee qaryatin min natheerin illa qala mutrafooha inna wajadna abaana 'ala ommatin wainna 'ala atharihim muqtadoon
Qala awalaw jitukum biahda mimma wajadtum 'alayhi abaakum qaloo inna bima orsiltum bihi kafiroon
Fantaqamna minhum fanthur kayfa kana 'aqibatu almukaththibeen
Waith qala ibraheemu liabeehi waqawmihi innanee baraon mimma ta'budoon
Illa allathee fataranee fainnahu sayahdeen
Waja'alaha kalimatan baqiyatan fee 'aqibihi la'allahum yarji'oon
Bal matta'tu haolai waabaahum hatta jaahumu alhaqqu warasoolun mubeen
Walamma jaahumu alhaqqu qaloo hatha sihrun wainna bihi kafiroon
Waqaloo lawla nuzzila hatha alquranu 'ala rajulin mina alqaryatayni 'atheem

Ahum yaqsimoona rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum ma'eeshatahum fee alhayati addunya warafa'na ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyattakhitha ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajma'oon
Walawla an yakoona annasu ommatan wahidatan laja'alna liman yakfuru birrahmani libuyootihim suqufan min fiddatin wama'arija 'alayha yathharoon
Walibuyootihim abwaban wasururan 'alayha yattakioon
Wazukhrufan wain kullu thalika lamma mata'u alhayati addunya walakhiratu 'inda rabbika lilmuttaqeen
Waman ya'shu 'an thikri arrahmani nuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qareen
Wainnahum layasuddoonahum 'ani assabeeli wayahsaboona annahum muhtadoon
Hatta itha jaana qala ya layta baynee wabaynaka bu'da almashriqayni fabisa alqareen
Walan yanfa'akumu alyawma ith thalamtum annakum fee al'athabi mushtarikoon
Afaanta tusmi'u assumma aw tahdee al'umya waman kana fee dalalin mubeen
Faimma nathhabanna bika fainna minhum muntaqimoon
Aw nuriyannaka allathee wa'adnahum fainna 'alayhim muqtadiroon
Fastamsik billathee oohiya ilayka innaka 'ala siratin mustaqeem
Wainnahu lathikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusaloon
Wasal man arsalna min qablika min rusulina aja'alna min dooni arrahmani alihatan yu'badoon
Walaqad arsalna moosa biayatina ila fir'awna wamalaihi faqala innee rasoolu rabbi al'alameen
Falamma jaahum biayatina itha hum minha yadhakoon
Wama nureehim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min okhtiha waakhathnahum bil'athabi la'allahum yarji'oon
Waqaloo ya ayyuha asahiru od'u lana rabbaka bima 'ahida 'indaka innana lamuhtadoon
Falamma kashafna 'anhumu al'athaba itha hum yankuthoon
Wanada fir'awnu fee qawmihi qala ya qawmi alaysa lee mulku misra wahathihi alanharu tajree min tahtee afala tubsiroon
Am ana khayrun min hatha allathee huwa maheenun wala yakadu yubeen
Falawla olqiya 'alayhi aswiratun min thahabin aw jaa ma'ahu almalaikatu muqtarineen
Fastakhaffa qawmahu faata'oohu innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
Falamma asafoona intaqamna minhum faaghraqnahum ajma'een
Faja'alnahum salafan wamathalan lilakhireen
Walamma duriba ibnu maryama mathalan itha qawmuka minhu yasiddoon
Waqaloo aalihatuna khayrun am huwa ma daraboohu laka illa jadalan bal hum qawmun khasimoon
In huwa illa 'abdun an'amna 'alayhi waja'alnahu mathalan libanee israeel
Walaw nashao laja'alna minkum malaikatan fee alardi yakhlufoon
Wainnahu la'ilmun lissa'ati fala tamtarunna biha wattabi'ooni hatha siratun mustaqeem
Wala yasuddannakumu ashshaytanu innahu lakum 'aduwwun mubeen
Walamma jaa 'eesa bilbayyinati qala qad jitukum bilhikmati waliobayyina lakum ba'da allathee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqoo Allaha waatee'oon
Inna Allaha huwa rabbee warabbukum fa'budoohu hatha siratun mustaqeem
Fakhtalafa alahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lillatheena thalamoo min 'athabi yawmin aleem
Hal yanthuroona illa assa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uroon
Alakhillao yawmaithin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illa almuttaqeen
Ya 'ibadi la khawfun 'alaykumu alyawma wala antum tahzanoon
Allatheena amanoo biayatina wakanoo muslimeen
Odkhuloo aljannata antum waazwajukum tuhbaroon
Yutafu 'alayhim bisihafin min thahabin waakwabin wafeeha ma tashtaheehi alanfusu watalaththu ala'yunu waantum feeha khalidoon
Watilka aljannatu allatee oorithtumooha bima kuntum ta'maloon
Lakum feeha fakihatun katheeratun minha takuloon
Inna almujrimeena fee 'athabi jahannama khalidoon
La yufattaru 'anhum wahum feehi mublisoon
Wama thalamnahum walakin kanoo humu aththalimeen
Wanadaw ya maliku liyaqdi 'alayna rabbuka qala innakum makithoon
Laqad jinakum bilhaqqi walakinna aktharakum lilhaqqi karihoon
Am abramoo amran fainna mubrimoon
Am yahsaboona anna la nasma'u sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusuluna ladayhim yaktuboon
Qul in kana lirrahmani waladun faana awwalu al'abideen
Subhana rabbi assamawati walardi rabbi al'arshi 'amma yasifoon
Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayal'aboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yoo'adoon
Wahuwa allathee fee assamai ilahun wafee alardi ilahun wahuwa alhakeemu al'aleem
Watabaraka allathee lahu mulku assamawati walardi wama baynahuma wa'indahu 'ilmu assa'ati wailayhi turja'oon
Wala yamliku allatheena yad'oona min doonihi ashshafa'ata illa man shahida bilhaqqi wahum ya'lamoon
Walain saaltahum man khalaqahum layaqoolunna Allahu faanna yufakoon
Waqeelihi yarabbi inna haolai qawmun la yuminoon
Fasfah 'anhum waqul salamun fasawfa ya'lamoon
Hameem
Walkitabi almubeen
Inna anzalnahu fee laylatin mubarakatin inna kunna munthireen
Feeha yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem
Amran min 'indina inna kunna mursileen
Rahmatan min rabbika innahu huwa assamee'u al'aleem
Rabbi assamawati walardi wama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineen
La ilaha illa huwa yuhyee wayumeetu rabbukum warabbu abaikumu alawwaleen
Bal hum fee shakkin yal'aboon
Fartaqib yawma tatee assamao bidukhanin mubeen
Yaghsha annasa hatha 'athabun aleem
Rabbana ikshif 'anna al'athaba inna muminoon
Anna lahumu aththikra waqad jaahum rasoolun mubeen
Thumma tawallaw 'anhu waqaloo mu'allamun majnoon
Inna kashifoo al'athabi qaleelan innakum 'aidoon
Yawma nabtishu albatshata alkubra inna muntaqimoon
Walaqad fatanna qablahum qawma fir'awna wajaahum rasoolun kareem
An addoo ilayya 'ibada Allahi innee lakum rasoolun ameen
Waan la ta'loo 'ala Allahi innee ateekum bisultanin mubeen
Wainnee 'uthtu birabbee warabbikum an tarjumoon
Wain lam tuminoo lee fa'taziloon
Fada'a rabbahu anna haolai qawmun mujrimoon
Faasri bi'ibadee laylan innakum muttaba'oon
Watruki albahra rahwan innahum jundun mughraqoon
Kam tarakoo min jannatin wa'uyoon
Wazuroo'in wamaqamin kareem
Wana'matin kanoo feeha fakiheen
Kathalika waawrathnaha qawman akhareen
Fama bakat 'alayhimu assamao walardu wama kanoo munthareen
Walaqad najjayna banee israeela mina al'athabi almuheen
Min fir'awna innahu kana 'aliyan mina almusrifeen
Walaqadi ikhtarnahum 'ala 'ilmin 'ala al'alameen
Waataynahum mina alayati ma feehi balaon mubeen
Inna haolai layaqooloon
In hiya illa mawtatuna aloola wama nahnu bimunshareen
Fatoo biabaina in kuntum sadiqeen
Ahum khayrun am qawmu tubba'in wallatheena min qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanoo mujrimeen
Wama khalaqna assamawati walarda wama baynahuma la'ibeen
Ma khalaqnahuma illa bilhaqqi walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamoon
Inna yawma alfasli meeqatuhum ajma'een
Yawma la yughnee mawlan 'an mawlan shayan wala hum yunsaroon
Illa man rahima Allahu innahu huwa al'azeezu arraheem
Inna shajarata azzaqqoom
Ta'amu alatheem
Kalmuhli yaghlee fee albutoon
Kaghalyi alhameem
Khuthoohu fa'tiloohu ila sawai aljaheem
Thumma subboo fawqa rasihi min 'athabi alhameem
Thuq innaka anta al'azeezu alkareem
Inna hatha ma kuntum bihi tamtaroon
Inna almuttaqeena fee maqamin ameen
Fee jannatin wa'uyoon
Yalbasoona min sundusin waistabraqin mutaqabileen
Kathalika wazawwajnahum bihoorin 'een
Yad'oona feeha bikulli fakihatin amineen
La yathooqoona feeha almawta illa almawtata aloola wawaqahum 'athaba aljaheem
Fadlan min rabbika thalika huwa alfawzu al'atheem
Fainnama yassarnahu bilisanika la'allahum yatathakkaroon
Fartaqib innahum murtaqiboon
Hameem
Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi al'azeezi alhakeem
Inna fee assamawati walardi laayatin lilmumineen
Wafee khalqikum wama yabuththu min dabbatin ayatun liqawmin yooqinoon
Wakhtilafi allayli wannahari wama anzala Allahu mina assamai min rizqin faahya bihi alarda ba'da mawtiha watasreefi arriyahi ayatun liqawmin ya'qiloon
Tilka ayatu Allahi natlooha 'alayka bilhaqqi fabiayyi hadeethin ba'da Allahi waayatihi yuminoon
Waylun likulli affakin atheem
Yasma'u ayati Allahi tutla 'alayhi thumma yusirru mustakbiran kaan lam yasma'ha fabashshirhu bi'athabin aleem
Waitha 'alima min ayatina shayan ittakhathaha huzuwan olaika lahum 'athabun muheen
Min waraihim jahannamu wala yughnee 'anhum ma kasaboo shayan wala ma ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi awliyaa walahum 'athabun 'atheem
Hatha hudan wallatheena kafaroo biayati rabbihim lahum 'athabun min rijzin aleem
Allahu allathee sakhkhara lakumu albahra litajriya alfulku feehi biamrihi walitabtaghoo min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuroon
Wasakhkhara lakum ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi jamee'an minhu inna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaroon
Qul lillatheena amanoo yaghfiroo lillatheena la yarjoona ayyama Allahi liyajziya qawman bima kanoo yaksiboon
Man 'amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha thumma ila rabbikum turja'oon
Walaqad atayna banee israeela alkitaba walhukma wannubuwwata warazaqnahum mina attayyibati wafaddalnahum 'ala al'alameen
Waataynahum bayyinatin mina alamri fama ikhtalafoo illa min ba'di ma jaahumu al'ilmu baghyan baynahum inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum yawma alqiyamati feema kanoo feehi yakhtalifoon
Thumma ja'alnaka 'ala sharee'atin mina alamri fattabi'ha wala tattabi' ahwaa allatheena la ya'lamoon
Innahum lan yughnoo 'anka mina Allahi shayan wainna aththalimeena ba'duhum awliyao ba'din wallahu waliyyu almuttaqeen
Hatha basairu linnasi wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yooqinoon
Am hasiba allatheena ijtarahoo assayyiati an naj'alahum kallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati sawaan mahyahum wamamatuhum saa ma yahkumoon
Wakhalaqa Allahu assamawati walarda bilhaqqi walitujza kullu nafsin bima kasabat wahum la yuthlamoon
Afaraayta mani ittakhatha ilahahu hawahu waadallahu Allahu 'ala 'ilmin wakhatama 'ala sam'ihi waqalbihi waja'ala 'ala basarihi ghishawatan faman yahdeehi min ba'di Allahi afala tathakkaroon
Waqaloo ma hiya illa hayatuna addunya namootu wanahya wama yuhlikuna illa addahru wama lahum bithalika min 'ilmin in hum illa yathunnoon
Waitha tutla 'alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ma kana hujjatahum illa an qaloo itoo biabaina in kuntum sadiqeen
Quli Allahu yuhyeekum thumma yumeetukum thumma yajma'ukum ila yawmi alqiyamati la rayba feehi walakinna akthara annasi la ya'lamoon
Walillahi mulku assamawati walardi wayawma taqoomu assa'atu yawmaithin yakhsaru almubtiloon
Watara kulla ommatin jathiyatan kullu ommatin tud'a ila kitabiha alyawma tujzawna ma kuntum ta'maloon
Hatha kitabuna yantiqu 'alaykum bilhaqqi inna kunna nastansikhu ma kuntum ta'maloon
Faamma allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati fayudkhiluhum rabbuhum fee rahmatihi thalika huwa alfawzu almubeen
Waamma allatheena kafaroo afalam takun ayatee tutla 'alaykum fastakbartum wakuntum qawman mujrimeen
Waitha qeela inna wa'da Allahi haqqun wassa'atu la rayba feeha qultum ma nadree ma assa'atu in nathunnu illa thannan wama nahnu bimustayqineen
Wabada lahum sayyiatu ma 'amiloo wahaqa bihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzioon
Waqeela alyawma nansakum kama naseetum liqaa yawmikum hatha wamawakumu annaru wama lakum min nasireen
Thalikum biannakumu ittakhathtum ayati Allahi huzuwan wagharratkumu alhayatu addunya falyawma la yukhrajoona minha wala hum yusta'taboon
Falillahi alhamdu rabbi assamawati warabbi alardi rabbi al'alameen
Walahu alkibriyao fee assamawati walardi wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Hameem
Tanzeelu alkitabi mina Allahi al'azeezi alhakeem
Ma khalaqna assamawati walarda wama baynahuma illa bilhaqqi waajalin musamman wallatheena kafaroo 'amma onthiroo mu'ridoon
Qul araaytum ma tad'oona min dooni Allahi aroonee matha khalaqoo mina alardi am lahum shirkun fee assamawati eetoonee bikitabin min qabli hatha aw atharatin min 'ilmin in kuntum sadiqeen
Waman adallu mimman yad'oo min dooni Allahi man la yastajeebu lahu ila yawmi alqiyamati wahum 'an du'aihim ghafiloon
Waitha hushira annasu kanoo lahum a'daan wakanoo bi'ibadatihim kafireen
Waitha tutla 'alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lilhaqqi lamma jaahum hatha sihrun mubeen
Am yaqooloona iftarahu qul ini iftaraytuhu fala tamlikoona lee mina Allahi shayan huwa a'lamu bima tufeedoona feehi kafa bihi shaheedan baynee wabaynakum wahuwa alghafooru arraheem
Qul ma kuntu bid'an mina arrusuli wama adree ma yuf'alu bee wala bikum in attabi'u illa ma yooha ilayya wama ana illa natheerun mubeen
Qul araaytum in kana min 'indi Allahi wakafartum bihi washahida shahidun min banee israeela 'ala mithlihi faamana wastakbartum inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma aththalimeen
Waqala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo law kana khayran ma sabaqoona ilayhi waith lam yahtadoo bihi fasayaqooloona hatha ifkun qadeem
Wamin qablihi kitabu moosa imaman warahmatan wahatha kitabun musaddiqun lisanan 'arabiyyan liyunthira allatheena thalamoo wabushra lilmuhsineen
Inna allatheena qaloo rabbuna Allahu thumma istaqamoo fala khawfun 'alayhim wala hum yahzanoon
Olaika ashabu aljannati khalideena feeha jazaan bima kanoo ya'maloon

Wawassayna alinsana biwalidayhi ihsanan hamalathu ommuhu kurhan wawada'athu kurhan wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathoona shahran hatta itha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arba'eena sanatan qala rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mataka allatee an'amta 'alayya wa'ala walidayya waan a'mala salihan tardahu waaslih lee fee thurriyyatee innee tubtu ilayka wainnee mina almuslimeen
Olaika allatheena nataqabbalu 'anhum ahsana ma 'amiloo wanatajawazu 'an sayyiatihim fee ashabi aljannati wa'da assidqi allathee kanoo yoo'adoon

Wallathee qala liwalidayhi offin lakuma ata'idaninee an okhraja waqad khalati alquroonu min qablee wahuma yastagheethani Allaha waylaka amin inna wa'da Allahi haqqun fayaqoolu ma hatha illa asateeru alawwaleen
Olaika allatheena haqqa 'alayhimu alqawlu fee umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina aljinni walinsi innahum kanoo khasireen
Walikullin darajatun mimma 'amiloo waliyuwaffiyahum a'malahum wahum la yuthlamoon

Wayawma yu'radu allatheena kafaroo 'ala annari athhabtum tayyibatikum fee hayatikumu addunya wastamta'tum biha falyawma tujzawna 'athaba alhooni bima kuntum tastakbiroona fee alardi bighayri alhaqqi wabima kuntum tafsuqoon
Wathkur akha 'adin ith anthara qawmahu bilahqafi waqad khalati annuthuru min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi alla ta'budoo illa Allaha innee akhafu 'alaykum 'athaba yawmin 'atheem
Qaloo ajitana litafikana 'an alihatina fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina assadiqeen
Qala innama al'ilmu 'inda Allahi waoballighukum ma orsiltu bihi walakinnee arakum qawman tajhaloon
Falamma raawhu 'aridan mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaloo hatha 'aridun mumtiruna bal huwa ma ista'jaltum bihi reehun feeha 'athabun aleem
Tudammiru kulla shayin biamri rabbiha faasbahoo la yura illa masakinuhum kathalika najzee alqawma almujrimeen

Walaqad makkannahum feema in makkannakum feehi waja'alna lahum sam'an waabsaran waafidatan fama aghna 'anhum sam'uhum wala absaruhum wala afidatuhum min shayin ith kanoo yajhadoona biayati Allahi wahaqa bihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzioon
Walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina alqura wasarrafna alayati la'allahum yarji'oon
Falawla nasarahumu allatheena ittakhathoo min dooni Allahi qurbanan alihatan bal dalloo 'anhum wathalika ifkuhum wama kanoo yaftaroon
Waith sarafna ilayka nafaran mina aljinni yastami'oona alqurana falamma hadaroohu qaloo ansitoo falamma qudiya wallaw ila qawmihim munthireen
Qaloo ya qawmana inna sami'na kitaban onzila min ba'di moosa musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi yahdee ila alhaqqi waila tareeqin mustaqeem
Ya qawmana ajeeboo da'iya Allahi waaminoo bihi yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayujirkum min 'athabin aleem
Waman la yujib da'iya Allahi falaysa bimu'jizin fee alardi walaysa lahu min doonihi awliyaa olaika fee dalalin mubeen
Awalam yaraw anna Allaha allathee khalaqa assamawati walarda walam ya'ya bikhalqihinna biqadirin 'ala an yuhyiya almawta bala innahu 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Wayawma yu'radu allatheena kafaroo 'ala annari alaysa hatha bilhaqqi qaloo bala warabbina qala fathooqoo al'athaba bima kuntum takfuroon
Fasbir kama sabara oloo al'azmi mina arrusuli wala tasta'jil lahum kaannahum yawma yarawna ma yoo'adoona lam yalbathoo illa sa'atan min naharin balaghun fahal yuhlaku illa alqawmu alfasiqoon
Allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo 'an sabeeli Allahi adalla a'malahum
Wallatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati waamanoo bima nuzzila 'ala muhammadin wahuwa alhaqqu min rabbihim kaffara 'anhum sayyiatihim waaslaha balahum
Thalika bianna allatheena kafaroo ittaba'oo albatila waanna allatheena amanoo ittaba'oo alhaqqa min rabbihim kathalika yadribu Allahu linnasi amthalahum

Faitha laqeetumu allatheena kafaroo fadarba arriqabi hatta itha athkhantumoohum fashuddoo alwathaqa faimma mannan ba'du waimma fidaan hatta tada'a alharbu awzaraha thalika walaw yashao Allahu lantasara minhum walakin liyabluwa ba'dakum biba'din wallatheena qutiloo fee sabeeli Allahi falan yudilla a'malahum
Sayahdeehim wayuslihu balahum
Wayudkhiluhumu aljannata 'arrafaha lahum
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo in tansuroo Allaha yansurkum wayuthabbit aqdamakum
Wallatheena kafaroo fata'san lahum waadalla a'malahum
Thalika biannahum karihoo ma anzala Allahu faahbata a'malahum
Afalam yaseeroo fee alardi fayanthuroo kayfa kana 'aqibatu allatheena min qablihim dammara Allahu 'alayhim walilkafireena amthaluha
Thalika bianna Allaha mawla allatheena amanoo waanna alkafireena la mawla lahum
Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wallatheena kafaroo yatamatta'oona wayakuloona kama takulu alan'amu wannaru mathwan lahum
Wakaayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allatee akhrajatka ahlaknahum fala nasira lahum
Afaman kana 'ala bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu sooo 'amalihi wattaba'oo ahwaahum

Mathalu aljannati allatee wu'ida almuttaqoona feeha anharun min main ghayri asinin waanharun min labanin lam yataghayyar ta'muhu waanharun min khamrin laththatin lishsharibeena waanharun min 'asalin musaffan walahum feeha min kulli aththamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fee annari wasuqoo maan hameeman faqatta'a am'aahum
Waminhum man yastami'u ilayka hatta itha kharajoo min 'indika qaloo lillatheena ootoo al'ilma matha qala anifan olaika allatheena taba'a Allahu 'ala quloobihim wattaba'oo ahwaahum
Wallatheena ihtadaw zadahum hudan waatahum taqwahum
Fahal yanthuroona illa assa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaa ashratuha faanna lahum itha jaathum thikrahum
Fa'lam annahu la ilaha illa Allahu wastaghfir lithanbika walilmumineena walmuminati wallahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wamathwakum

Wayaqoolu allatheena amanoo lawla nuzzilat sooratun faitha onzilat sooratun muhkamatun wathukira feeha alqitalu raayta allatheena fee quloobihim maradun yanthuroona ilayka nathara almaghshiyyi 'alayhi mina almawti faawla lahum
Ta'atun waqawlun ma'roofun faitha 'azama alamru falaw sadaqoo Allaha lakana khayran lahum
Fahal 'asaytum in tawallaytum an tufsidoo fee alardi watuqatti'oo arhamakum
Olaika allatheena la'anahumu Allahu faasammahum waa'ma absarahum
Afala yatadabbaroona alqurana am 'ala quloobin aqfaluha
Inna allatheena irtaddoo 'ala adbarihim min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu alhuda ashshaytanu sawwala lahum waamla lahum
Thalika biannahum qaloo lillatheena karihoo ma nazzala Allahu sanutee'ukum fee ba'di alamri wallahu ya'lamu israrahum
Fakayfa itha tawaffathumu almalaikatu yadriboona wujoohahum waadbarahum
Thalika biannahumu ittaba'oo ma askhata Allaha wakarihoo ridwanahu faahbata a'malahum
Am hasiba allatheena fee quloobihim maradun an lan yukhrija Allahu adghanahum
Walaw nashao laaraynakahum fala'araftahum biseemahum walata'rifannahum fee lahni alqawli wallahu ya'lamu a'malakum
Walanabluwannakum hatta na'lama almujahideena minkum wassabireena wanabluwa akhbarakum
Inna allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo 'an sabeeli Allahi washaqqoo arrasoola min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu alhuda lan yaduroo Allaha shayan wasayuhbitu a'malahum
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo atee'oo Allaha waatee'oo arrasoola wala tubtiloo a'malakum
Inna allatheena kafaroo wasaddoo 'an sabeeli Allahi thumma matoo wahum kuffarun falan yaghfira Allahu lahum
Fala tahinoo watad'oo ila assalmi waantumu ala'lawna wallahu ma'akum walan yatirakum a'malakum
Innama alhayatu addunya la'ibun walahwun wain tuminoo watattaqoo yutikum ojoorakum wala yasalkum amwalakum
In yasalkumooha fayuhfikum tabkhaloo wayukhrij adghanakum

Haantum haolai tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeeli Allahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fainnama yabkhalu 'an nafsihi wallahu alghaniyyu waantumu alfuqarao wain tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakoonoo amthalakum
Inna fatahna laka fathan mubeena
Liyaghfira laka Allahu ma taqaddama min thanbika wama taakhkhara wayutimma ni'matahu 'alayka wayahdiyaka siratan mustaqeema
Wayansuraka Allahu nasran 'azeeza
Huwa allathee anzala assakeenata fee quloobi almumineena liyazdadoo eemanan ma'a eemanihim walillahi junoodu assamawati walardi wakana Allahu 'aleeman hakeema
Liyudkhila almumineena walmuminati jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha wayukaffira 'anhum sayyiatihim wakana thalika 'inda Allahi fawzan 'atheema

Wayu'aththiba almunafiqeena walmunafiqati walmushrikeena walmushrikati aththanneena billahi thanna assawi 'alayhim dairatu assawi waghadiba Allahu 'alayhim wala'anahum waa'adda lahum jahannama wasaat maseera
Walillahi junoodu assamawati walardi wakana Allahu 'azeezan hakeema
Inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashshiran wanatheera
Lituminoo billahi warasoolihi watu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbihoohu bukratan waaseela
Inna allatheena yubayi'oonaka innama yubayi'oona Allaha yadu Allahi fawqa aydeehim faman nakatha fainnama yankuthu 'ala nafsihi waman awfa bima 'ahada 'alayhu Allaha fasayuteehi ajran 'atheema

Sayaqoolu laka almukhallafoona mina ala'rabi shaghalatna amwaluna waahloona fastaghfir lana yaqooloona bialsinatihim ma laysa fee quloobihim qul faman yamliku lakum mina Allahi shayan in arada bikum darran aw arada bikum naf'an bal kana Allahu bima ta'maloona khabeera
Bal thanantum an lan yanqaliba arrasoolu walmuminoona ila ahleehim abadan wazuyyina thalika fee quloobikum wathanantum thanna assawi wakuntum qawman boora
Waman lam yumin billahi warasoolihi fainna a'tadna lilkafireena sa'eera
Walillahi mulku assamawati walardi yaghfiru liman yashao wayu'aththibu man yashao wakana Allahu ghafooran raheema

Sayaqoolu almukhallafoona itha intalaqtum ila maghanima litakhuthooha tharoona nattabi'kum yureedoona an yubaddiloo kalama Allahi qul lan tattabi'oona kathalikum qala Allahu min qablu fasayaqooloona bal tahsudoonana bal kanoo la yafqahoona illa qaleela

Qul lilmukhallafeena mina ala'rabi satud'awna ila qawmin olee basin shadeedin tuqatiloonahum aw yuslimoona fain tutee'oo yutikumu Allahu ajran hasanan wain tatawallaw kama tawallaytum min qablu yu'aththibkum 'athaban aleema

Laysa 'ala ala'ma harajun wala 'ala ala'raji harajun wala 'ala almareedi harajun waman yuti'i Allaha warasoolahu yudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu waman yatawalla yu'aththibhu 'athaban aleema
Laqad radiya Allahu 'ani almumineena ith yubayi'oonaka tahta ashshajarati fa'alima ma fee quloobihim faanzala asakeenata 'alayhim waathabahum fathan qareeba
Wamaghanima katheeratan yakhuthoonaha wakana Allahu 'azeezan hakeema
Wa'adakumu Allahu maghanima katheeratan takhuthoonaha fa'ajjala lakum hathihi wakaffa aydiya annasi 'ankum walitakoona ayatan lilmumineena wayahdiyakum siratan mustaqeema
Waokhra lam taqdiroo 'alayha qad ahata Allahu biha wakana Allahu 'ala kulli shayin qadeera
Walaw qatalakumu allatheena kafaroo lawallawoo aladbara thumma la yajidoona waliyyan wala naseera
Sunnata Allahi allatee qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati Allahi tabdeela
Wahuwa allathee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum waaydiyakum 'anhum bibatni makkata min ba'di an athfarakum 'alayhim wakana Allahu bima ta'maloona baseera

Humu allatheena kafaroo wasaddookum 'ani almasjidi alharami walhadya ma'koofan an yablugha mahillahu walawla rijalun muminoona wanisaon muminatun lam ta'lamoohum an tataoohum fatuseebakum minhum ma'arratun bighayri 'ilmin liyudkhila Allahu fee rahmatihi man yashao law tazayyaloo la'aththabna allatheena kafaroo minhum 'athaban aleema

Ith ja'ala allatheena kafaroo fee quloobihimu alhamiyyata hamiyyata aljahiliyyati faanzala Allahu sakeenatahu 'ala rasoolihi wa'ala almumineena waalzamahum kalimata attaqwa wakanoo ahaqqa biha waahlaha wakana Allahu bikulli shayin 'aleema

Laqad sadaqa Allahu rasoolahu arruya bilhaqqi latadkhulunna almasjida alharama in shaa Allahu amineena muhalliqeena ruoosakum wamuqassireena la takhafoona fa'alima ma lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni thalika fathan qareeba
Huwa allathee arsala rasoolahu bilhuda wadeeni alhaqqi liyuthhirahu 'ala addeeni kullihi wakafa billahi shaheeda

Muhammadun rasoolu Allahi wallatheena ma'ahu ashiddao 'ala alkuffari ruhamao baynahum tarahum rukka'an sujjadan yabtaghoona fadlan mina Allahi waridwanan seemahum fee wujoohihim min athari assujoodi thalika mathaluhum fee attawrati wamathaluhum fee alinjeeli kazar'in akhraja shatahu faazarahu fastaghlatha fastawa 'ala sooqihi yu'jibu azzurra'a liyagheetha bihimu alkuffara wa'ada Allahu allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati minhum maghfiratan waajran 'atheema
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tuqaddimoo bayna yadayi Allahi warasoolihi wattaqoo Allaha inna Allaha samee'un 'aleem
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tarfa'oo aswatakum fawqa sawti annabiyyi wala tajharoo lahu bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba'din an tahbata a'malukum waantum la tash'uroon
Inna allatheena yaghuddoona aswatahum 'inda rasooli Allahi olaika allatheena imtahana Allahu quloobahum littaqwa lahum maghfiratun waajrun 'atheem
Inna allatheena yunadoonaka min warai alhujurati aktharuhum la ya'qiloon
Walaw annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilayhim lakana khayran lahum wallahu ghafoorun raheem
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo in jaakum fasiqun binabain fatabayyanoo an tuseeboo qawman bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'ala ma fa'altum nadimeen

Wa'lamoo anna feekum rasoola Allahi law yutee'ukum fee katheerin mina alamri la'anittum walakinna Allaha habbaba ilaykumu aleemana wazayyanahu fee quloobikum wakarraha ilaykumu alkufra walfusooqa wal'isyana olaika humu arrashidoon
Fadlan mina Allahi wani'matan wallahu 'aleemun hakeem

Wain taifatani mina almumineena iqtataloo faaslihoo baynahuma fain baghat ihdahuma 'ala alokhra faqatiloo allatee tabghee hatta tafeea ila amri Allahi fain faat faaslihoo baynahuma bil'adli waaqsitoo inna Allaha yuhibbu almuqsiteen
Innama almuminoona ikhwatun faaslihoo bayna akhawaykum wattaqoo Allaha la'allakum turhamoon

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin 'asa an yakoonoo khayran minhum wala nisaon min nisain 'asa an yakunna khayran minhunna wala talmizoo anfusakum wala tanabazoo bilalqabi bisa alismu alfusooqu ba'da aleemani waman lam yatub faolaika humu aththalimoon

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ijtaniboo katheeran mina aththanni inna ba'da aththanni ithmun wala tajassasoo wala yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akheehi maytan fakarihtumoohu wattaqoo Allaha inna Allaha tawwabun raheem
Ya ayyuha annasu inna khalaqnakum min thakarin waontha waja'alnakum shu'ooban waqabaila lita'arafoo inna akramakum 'inda Allahi atqakum inna Allaha 'aleemun khabeer
Qalati ala'rabu amanna qul lam tuminoo walakin qooloo aslamna walamma yadkhuli aleemanu fee quloobikum wain tutee'oo Allaha warasoolahu la yalitkum min a'malikum shayan inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
Innama almuminoona allatheena amanoo billahi warasoolihi thumma lam yartaboo wajahadoo biamwalihim waanfusihim fee sabeeli Allahi olaika humu assadiqoon
Qul atu'allimoona Allaha bideenikum wallahu ya'lamu ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi wallahu bikulli shayin 'aleem
Yamunnoona 'alayka an aslamoo qul la tamunnoo 'alayya islamakum bali Allahu yamunnu 'alaykum an hadakum lileemani in kuntum sadiqeen
Inna Allaha ya'lamu ghayba assamawati walardi wallahu baseerun bima ta'maloon
Qaf walqurani almajeed
Bal 'ajiboo an jaahum munthirun minhum faqala alkafiroona hatha shayon 'ajeeb
Aitha mitna wakunna turaban thalika raj'un ba'eed
Qad 'alimna ma tanqusu alardu minhum wa'indana kitabun hafeeth
Bal kaththaboo bilhaqqi lamma jaahum fahum fee amrin mareej
Afalam yanthuroo ila assamai fawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannaha wama laha min furooj
Walarda madadnaha waalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatna feeha min kulli zawjin baheej
Tabsiratan wathikra likulli 'abdin muneeb
Wanazzalna mina assamai maan mubarakan faanbatna bihi jannatin wahabba alhaseed
Wannakhla basiqatin laha tal'un nadeed
Rizqan lil'ibadi waahyayna bihi baldatan maytan kathalika alkhurooj
Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waashabu arrassi wathamood
Wa'adun wafir'awnu waikhwanu loot
Waashabu alaykati waqawmu tubba'in kullun kaththaba arrusula fahaqqa wa'eed
Afa'ayeena bilkhalqi alawwali bal hum fee labsin min khalqin jadeed
Walaqad khalaqna alinsana wana'lamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli alwareed
Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyani 'ani alyameeni wa'ani ashshimali qa'eed
Ma yalfithu min qawlin illa ladayhi raqeebun 'ateed
Wajaat sakratu almawti bilhaqqi thalika ma kunta minhu taheed
Wanufikha fee assoori thalika yawmu alwa'eed
Wajaat kullu nafsin ma'aha saiqun washaheed
Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hatha fakashafna 'anka ghitaaka fabasaruka alyawma hadeed
Waqala qareenuhu hatha ma ladayya 'ateed
Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarin 'aneed
Manna'in lilkhayri mu'tadin mureeb
Allathee ja'ala ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee al'athabi ashshadeed
Qala qareenuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalin ba'eed
Qala la takhtasimoo ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bilwa'eed
Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wama ana bithallamin lil'abeed
Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtalati wataqoolu hal min mazeed
Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayra ba'eed
Hatha ma too'adoona likulli awwabin hafeeth
Man khashiya arrahmana bilghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneeb
Odkhulooha bisalamin thalika yawmu alkhulood
Lahum ma yashaoona feeha waladayna mazeed
Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi hal min mahees
Inna fee thalika lathikra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa assam'a wahuwa shaheed
Walaqad khalaqna assamawati walarda wama baynahuma fee sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughoob
Fasbir 'ala ma yaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tuloo'i ashshamsi waqabla alghuroob
Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waadbara assujood
Wastami' yawma yunadi almunadi min makanin qareeb
Yawma yasma'oona assayhata bilhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooj
Inna nahnu nuhyee wanumeetu wailayna almaseer
Yawma tashaqqaqu alardu 'anhum sira'an thalika hashrun 'alayna yaseer
Nahnu a'lamu bima yaqooloona wama anta 'alayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bilqurani man yakhafu wa'eed
Waththariyati tharwa
Falhamilati wiqra
Faljariyati yusra
Falmuqassimati amra
Innama too'adoona lasadiq
Wainna addeena lawaqi'
Wassamai thati alhubuk
Innakum lafee qawlin mukhtalif
Yufaku 'anhu man ofik
Qutila alkharrasoon
Allatheena hum fee ghamratin sahoon
Yasaloona ayyana yawmu addeen
Yawma hum 'ala annari yuftanoon
Thooqoo fitnatakum hatha allathee kuntum bihi tasta'jiloon
Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin wa'uyoon
Akhitheena ma atahum rabbuhum innahum kanoo qabla thalika muhsineen
Kanoo qaleelan mina allayli ma yahja'oon
Wabilashari hum yastaghfiroon
Wafee amwalihim haqqun lissaili walmahroom
Wafee alardi ayatun lilmooqineen
Wafee anfusikum afala tubsiroon
Wafee assamai rizqukum wama too'adoon
Fawarabbi assamai walardi innahu lahaqqun mithla ma annakum tantiqoon
Hal ataka hadeethu dayfi ibraheema almukrameen
Ith dakhaloo 'alayhi faqaloo salaman qala salamun qawmun munkaroon
Faragha ila ahlihi fajaa bi'ijlin sameen
Faqarrabahu ilayhim qala ala takuloon
Faawjasa minhum kheefatan qaloo la takhaf wabashsharoohu bighulamin 'aleem
Faaqbalati imraatuhu fee sarratin fasakkat wajhaha waqalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem
Qaloo kathaliki qala rabbuki innahu huwa alhakeemu al'aleem
Qala fama khatbukum ayyuha almursaloon
Qaloo inna orsilna ila qawmin mujrimeen
Linursila 'alayhim hijaratan min teen
Musawwamatan 'inda rabbika lilmusrifeen
Faakhrajna man kana feeha mina almumineen
Fama wajadna feeha ghayra baytin mina almuslimeen
Watarakna feeha ayatan lillatheena yakhafoona al'athaba alaleem
Wafee moosa ith arsanahu ila fir'awna bisultanin mubeen
Fatawalla biruknihi waqala sahirun aw majnoon
Faakhathnahu wajunoodahu fanabathnahum fee alyammi wahuwa muleem
Wafee 'adin ith arsalna 'alayhimu arreeha al'aqeem
Ma tatharu min shayin atat 'alayhi illa ja'alathu karrameem
Wafee thamooda ith qeela lahum tamatta'oo hatta heen
Fa'ataw 'an amri rabbihim faakhathathumu assa'iqatu wahum yanthuroon
Fama istata'oo min qiyamin wama kanoo muntasireen
Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
Wassamaa banaynaha biaydin wainna lamoosi'oon
Walarda farashnaha fani'ma almahidoon
Wamin kulli shayin khalaqna zawjayni la'allakum tathakkaroon
Fafirroo ila Allahi innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeen
Wala taj'aloo ma'a Allahi ilahan akhara innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeen
Kathalika ma ata allatheena min qablihim min rasoolin illa qaloo sahirun aw majnoon
Atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghoon
Fatawalla 'anhum fama anta bimaloom
Wathakkir fainna aththikra tanfa'u almumineen
Wama khalaqtu aljinna walinsa illa liya'budoon
Ma oreedu minhum min rizqin wama oreedu an yut'imoon
Inna Allaha huwa arrazzaqu thoo alquwwati almateen
Fainna lillatheena thalamoo thanooban mithla thanoobi ashabihim fala yasta'jiloon
Fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min yawmihimu allathee yoo'adoon
Wattoor
Wakitabin mastoor
Fee raqqin manshoor
Walbayti alma'moor
Wassaqfi almarfoo'
Walbahri almasjoor
Inna 'athaba rabbika lawaqi'
Ma lahu min dafi'
Yawma tamooru assamao mawra
Wataseeru aljibalu sayra
Fawaylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeen
Allatheena hum fee khawdin yal'aboon
Yawma yuda''oona ila nari jahannama da''a
Hathihi annaru allatee kuntum biha tukaththiboon
Afasihrun hatha am antum la tubsiroon

Sabbaha lillahi ma fee assamawati walardi wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Lahu mulku assamawati walardi yuhyee wayumeetu wahuwa 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Huwa alawwalu walakhiru waththahiru walbatinu wahuwa bikulli shayin 'aleem

Huwa allathee khalaqa assamawati walarda fee sittati ayyamin thumma istawa 'ala al'arshi ya'lamu ma yaliju fee alardi wama yakhruju minha wama yanzilu mina assamai wama ya'ruju feeha wahuwa ma'akum ayna ma kuntum wallahu bima ta'maloona baseer
Lahu mulku assamawati walardi waila Allahi turja'u alomoor
Yooliju allayla fee annahari wayooliju annahara fee allayi wahuwa 'aleemun bithati assudoor
Aminoo billahi warasoolihi waanfiqoo mimma ja'alakum mustakhlafeena feehi fallatheena amanoo minkum waanfaqoo lahum ajrun kabeer
Wama lakum la tuminoona billahi warrasoolu yad'ookum lituminoo birabbikum waqad akhatha meethaqakum in kuntum mumineen
Huwa allathee yunazzilu 'ala 'abdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukhrijakum mina aththulumati ila annoori wainna Allaha bikum laraoofun raheem

Wama lakum alla tunfiqoo fee sabeeli Allahi walillahi meerathu assamawati walardi la yastawee minkum man anfaqa min qabli alfathi waqatala olaika a'thamu darajatan mina allatheena anfaqoo min ba'du waqataloo wakullan wa'ada Allahu alhusna wallahu bima ta'maloona khabeer
Man tha allathee yuqridu Allaha qardan hasanan fayuda'ifahu lahu walahu ajrun kareem
Yawma tara almumineena walmuminati yas'a nooruhum bayna aydeehim wabiaymanihim bushrakumu alyawma jannatun tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha thalika huwa alfawzu al'atheem

Yawma yaqoolu almunafiqoona walmunafiqatu lillatheena amanoo onthuroona naqtabis min noorikum qeela irji'oo waraakum faltamisoo nooran faduriba baynahum bisoorin lahu babun batinuhu feehi arrahmatu wathahiruhu min qibalihi al'athab
Yunadoonahum alam nakun ma'akum qaloo bala walakinnakum fatantum anfusakum watarabbastum wartabtum wagharratkumu alamaniyyu hatta jaa amru Allahi wagharrakum billahi algharoor
Falyawma la yukhathu minkum fidyatun wala mina allatheena kafaroo mawakumu annaru hiya mawlakum wabisa almaseer

Alam yani lillatheena amanoo an takhsha'a quloobuhum lithikri Allahi wama nazala mina alhaqqi wala yakoonoo kallatheena ootoo alkitaba min qablu fatala 'alayhimu alamadu faqasat quloobuhum wakatheerun minhum fasiqoon
I'lamoo anna Allaha yuhyee alarda ba'da mawtiha qad bayyanna lakumu alayati la'allakum ta'qiloon
Inna almussaddiqeena walmussaddiqati waaqradoo Allaha qardan hasanan yuda'afu lahum walahum ajrun kareem
Wallatheena amanoo billahi warusulihi olaika humu assiddeeqoona washshuhadao 'inda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanooruhum wallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina olaika ashabu aljaheem

I'lamoo annama alhayatu addunya la'ibun walahwun wazeenatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fee alamwali walawladi kamathali ghaythin a'jaba alkuffara nabatuhu thumma yaheeju fatarahu musfarran thumma yakoonu hutaman wafee alakhirati 'athabun shadeedun wamaghfiratun mina Allahi waridwanun wama alhayatu addunya illa mata'u alghuroor
Sabiqoo ila maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin 'arduha ka'ardi assamai walardi o'iddat lillatheena amanoo billahi warusulihi thalika fadlu Allahi yuteehi man yashao wallahu thoo alfadli al'atheem
Ma asaba min museebatin fee alardi wala fee anfusikum illa fee kitabin min qabli an nabraaha inna thalika 'ala Allahi yaseer
Likayla tasaw 'ala ma fatakum wala tafrahoo bima atakum wallahu la yuhibbu kulla mukhtalin fakhoor
Allatheena yabkhaloona wayamuroona annasa bilbukhli waman yatawalla fainna Allaha huwa alghaniyyu alhameed

Laqad arsalna rusulana bilbayyinati waanzalna ma'ahumu alkitaba walmeezana liyaqooma annasu bilqisti waanzalna alhadeeda feehi basun shadeedun wamanafi'u linnasi waliya'lama Allahu man yansuruhu warusulahu bilghaybi inna Allaha qawiyyun 'azeez
Walaqad arsalna noohan waibraheema waja'alna fee thurriyyatihima annubuwwata walkitaba faminhum muhtadin wakatheerun minhum fasiqoon

Thumma qaffayna 'ala atharihim birusulina waqaffayna bi'eesa ibni maryama waataynahu alinjeela waja'alna fee quloobi allatheena ittaba'oohu rafatan warahmatan warahbaniyyatan ibtada'ooha ma katabnaha 'alayhim illa ibtighaa ridwani Allahi fama ra'awha haqqa ri'ayatiha faatayna allatheena amanoo minhum ajrahum wakatheerun minhum fasiqoon
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ittaqoo Allaha waaminoo birasoolihi yutikum kiflayni min rahmatihi wayaj'al lakum nooran tamshoona bihi wayaghfir lakum wallahu ghafoorun raheem
Lialla ya'lama ahlu alkitabi alla yaqdiroona 'ala shayin min fadli Allahi waanna alfadla biyadi Allahi yuteehi man yashao wallahu thoo alfadli al'atheem
Qad sami'a Allahu qawla allatee tujadiluka fee zawjiha watashtakee ila Allahi wallahu yasma'u tahawurakuma inna Allaha samee'un baseer
Allatheena yuthahiroona minkum min nisaihim ma hunna ommahatihim in ommahatuhum illa allaee waladnahum wainnahum layaqooloona munkaran mina alqawli wazooran wainna Allaha la'afuwwun ghafoor
Wallatheena yuthahiroona min nisaihim thumma ya'oodoona lima qaloo fatahreeru raqabatin min qabli an yatamassa thalikum too'athoona bihi wallahu bima ta'maloona khabeer

Faman lam yajid fasiyamu shahrayni mutatabi'ayni min qabli an yatamassa faman lam yastati' fait'amu sitteena miskeenan thalika lituminoo billahi warasoolihi watilka hudoodu Allahi walilkafireena 'athabun aleem
Inna allatheena yuhaddoona Allaha warasoolahu kubitoo kama kubita allatheena min qablihim waqad anzalna ayatin bayyinatin walilkafireena 'athabun muheen
Yawma yab'athuhumu Allahu jamee'an fayunabbiohum bima 'amiloo ahsahu Allahu wanasoohu wallahu 'ala kulli shayin shaheed

Alam tara anna Allaha ya'lamu ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi ma yakoonu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabi'uhum wala khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum wala adna min thalika wala akthara illa huwa ma'ahum ayna ma kanoo thumma yunabbiohum bima 'amiloo yawma alqiyamati inna Allaha bikulli shayin 'aleem

Alam tara ila allatheena nuhoo 'ani annajwa thumma ya'oodoona lima nuhoo 'anhu wayatanajawna bilithmi wal'udwani wama'siyati arrasooli waitha jaooka hayyawka bima lam yuhayyika bihi Allahu wayaqooloona fee anfusihim lawla yu'aththibuna Allahu bima naqoolu hasbuhum jahannamu yaslawnaha fabisa almaseer
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha tanajaytum fala tatanajaw bilithmi wal'udwani wama'siyati arrasooli watanajaw bilbirri wattaqwa wattaqoo Allaha allathee ilayhi tuhsharoon
Innama annajwa mina ashshaytani liyahzuna allatheena amanoo walaysa bidarrihim shayan illa biithni Allahi wa'ala Allahi falyatawakkali almuminoon

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha qeela lakum tafassahoo fee almajalisi fafsahoo yafsahi Allahu lakum waitha qeela onshuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'i Allahu allatheena amanoo minkum wallatheena ootoo al'ilma darajatin wallahu bima ta'maloona khabeer
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha najaytumu arrasoola faqaddimoo bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatan thalika khayrun lakum waatharu fain lam tajidoo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
Aashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatin faith lam taf'aloo wataba Allahu 'alaykum faaqeemoo assalata waatoo azzakata waatee'oo Allaha warasoolahu wallahu khabeerun bima ta'maloon
Alam tara ila allatheena tawallaw qawman ghadiba Allahu 'alayhim ma hum minkum wala minhum wayahlifoona 'ala alkathibi wahum ya'lamoon
a'adda Allahu lahum 'athaban shadeedan innahum saa ma kanoo ya'maloon
Ittakhathoo aymanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeeli Allahi falahum 'athabun muheen
Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaluhum wala awladuhum mina Allahi shayan olaika ashabu annari hum feeha khalidoon
Yawma yab'athuhumu Allahu jamee'an fayahlifoona lahu kama yahlifoona lakum wayahsaboona annahum 'ala shayin ala innahum humu alkathiboon
Istahwatha 'alayhimu ashshaytanu faansahum thikra Allahi olaika hizbu ashshaytani ala inna hizba ashshaytani humu alkhasiroon
Inna allatheena yuhaddoona Allaha warasoolahu olaika fee alathalleen
Kataba Allahu laaghlibanna ana warusulee inna Allaha qawiyyun 'azeez

La tajidu qawman yuminoona billahi walyawmi alakhiri yuwaddoona man hadda Allaha warasoolahu walaw kanoo abaahum aw abnaahum aw ikhwanahum aw 'asheeratahum olaika kataba fee quloobihimu aleemana waayyadahum biroohin minhu wayudkhiluhum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha radiya Allahu 'anhum waradoo 'anhu olaika hizbu Allahi ala inna hizba Allahi humu almuflihoon
Sabbaha lillahi ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem

Huwa allathee akhraja allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi min diyarihim liawwali alhashri ma thanantum an yakhrujoo wathannoo annahum mani'atuhum husoonuhum mina Allahi faatahumu Allahu min haythu lam yahtasiboo waqathafa fee quloobihimu arru'ba yukhriboona buyootahum biaydeehim waaydee almumineena fa'tabiroo ya olee alabsar
Walawla an kataba Allahu 'alayhimu aljalaa la'aththabahum fee addunya walahum fee alakhirati 'athabu annar
Thalika biannahum shaqqoo Allaha warasoolahu waman yushaqqi Allaha fainna Allaha shadeedu al'iqab
Ma qata'tum min leenatin aw taraktumooha qaimatan 'ala osooliha fabiithni Allahi waliyukhziya alfasiqeen
Wama afaa Allahu 'ala rasoolihi minhum fama awjaftum 'alayhi min khaylin wala rikabin walakinna Allaha yusallitu rusulahu 'ala man yashao wallahu 'ala kulli shayin qadeer

Ma afaa Allahu 'ala rasoolihi min ahli alqura falillahi walirrasooli walithee alqurba walyatama walmasakeeni wabni assabeeli kay la yakoona doolatan bayna alaghniyai minkum wama atakumu arrasoolu fakhuthoohu wama nahakum 'anhu fantahoo wattaqoo Allaha inna Allaha shadeedu al'iqab
Lilfuqarai almuhajireena allatheena okhrijoo min diyarihim waamwalihim yabtaghoona fadlan mina Allahi waridwanan wayansuroona Allaha warasoolahu olaika humu assadiqoon

Wallatheena tabawwaoo addara waleemana min qablihim yuhibboona man hajara ilayhim wala yajidoona fee sudoorihim hajatan mimma ootoo wayuthiroona 'ala anfusihim walaw kana bihim khasasatun waman yooqa shuhha nafsihi faolaika humu almuflihoon
Wallatheena jaoo min ba'dihim yaqooloona rabbana ighfir lana waliikhwanina allatheena sabaqoona bileemani wala taj'al fee quloobina ghillan lillatheena amanoo rabbana innaka raoofun raheem

Alam tara ila allatheena nafaqoo yaqooloona liikhwanihimu allatheena kafaroo min ahli alkitabi lain okhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wala nutee'u feekum ahadan abadan wain qootiltum lanansurannakum wallahu yashhadu innahum lakathiboon
Lain okhrijoo la yakhrujoona ma'ahum walain qootiloo la yansuroonahum walain nasaroohum layuwallunna aladbara thumma la yunsaroon
Laantum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim mina Allahi thalika biannahum qawmun la yafqahoon
La yuqatiloonakum jamee'an illa fee quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadeedun tahsabuhum jamee'an waquloobuhum shatta thalika biannahum qawmun la ya'qiloon
Kamathali allatheena min qablihim qareeban thaqoo wabala amrihim walahum 'athabun aleem
Kamathali ashshaytani ith qala lilinsani okfur falamma kafara qala innee bareeon minka innee akhafu Allaha rabba al'alameen
Fakana 'aqibatahuma annahuma fee annari khalidayni feeha wathalika jazao aththalimeen
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo ittaqoo Allaha waltanthur nafsun ma qaddamat lighadin wattaqoo Allaha inna Allaha khabeerun bima ta'maloon
Wala takoonoo kallatheena nasoo Allaha faansahum anfusahum olaika humu alfasiqoon
La yastawee ashabu annari waashabu aljannati ashabu aljannati humu alfaizoon
Law anzalna hatha alqurana 'ala jabalin laraaytahu khashi'an mutasaddi'an min khashyati Allahi watilka alamthalu nadribuha linnasi la'allahum yatafakkaroon
Huwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa 'alimu alghaybi washshahadati huwa arrahmanu arraheem
Huwa Allahu allathee la ilaha illa huwa almaliku alquddoosu assalamu almuminu almuhayminu al'azeezu aljabbaru almutakabbiru subhana Allahi 'amma yushrikoon
Huwa Allahu alkhaliqu albario almusawwiru lahu alasmao alhusna yusabbihu lahu ma fee assamawati walardi wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tattakhithoo 'aduwwee wa'aduwwakum awliyaa tulqoona ilayhim bilmawaddati waqad kafaroo bima jaakum mina alhaqqi yukhrijoona arrasoola waiyyakum an tuminoo billahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihadan fee sabeelee wabtighaa mardatee tusirroona ilayhim bilmawaddati waana a'lamu bima akhfaytum wama a'lantum waman yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaa assabeel
In yathqafookum yakoonoo lakam a'daan wayabsutoo ilaykum aydiyahum waalsinatahum bissooi wawaddoo law takfuroon
Lan tanfa'akum arhamukum wala awladukum yawma alqiyamati yafsilu baynakum wallahu bima ta'maloona baseer

Qad kanat lakum oswatun hasanatun fee ibraheema wallatheena ma'ahu ith qaloo liqawmihim inna buraao minkum wamimma ta'budoona min dooni Allahi kafarna bikum wabada baynana wabaynakumu al'adawatu walbaghdao abadan hatta tuminoo billahi wahdahu illa qawla ibraheema liabeehi laastaghfiranna laka wama amliku laka mina Allahi min shayin rabbana 'alayka tawakkalna wailayka anabna wailayka almaseer
Rabbana la taj'alna fitnatan lillatheena kafaroo waghfir lana rabbana innaka anta al'azeezu alhakeem
Laqad kana lakum feehim oswatun hasanatun liman kana yarjoo Allaha walyawma alakhira waman yatawalla fainna Allaha huwa alghanniyyu alhameed
'asa Allahu an yaj'ala baynakum wabayna allatheena 'adaytum minhum mawaddatan wallahu qadeerun wallahu ghafoorun raheem
La yanhakumu Allahu 'ani allatheena lam yuqatilookum fee addeeni walam yukhrijookum min diyarikum an tabarroohum watuqsitoo ilayhim inna Allaha yuhibbu almuqsiteen
Innama yanhakumu Allahu 'ani allatheena qatalookum fee addeeni waakhrajookum min diyarikum wathaharoo 'ala ikhrajikum an tawallawhum waman yatawallahum faolaika humu aththalimoon

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha jaakumu almuminatu muhajiratin famtahinoohunna Allahu a'lamu bieemanihinna fain 'alimtumoohunna muminatin fala tarji'oohunna ila alkuffari la hunna hillun lahum wala hum yahilloona lahunna waatoohum ma anfaqoo wala junaha 'alaykum an tankihoohunna itha ataytumoohunna ojoorahunna wala tumsikoo bi'isami alkawafiri wasaloo ma anfaqtum walyasaloo ma anfaqoo thalikum hukmu Allahi yahkumu baynakum wallahu 'aleemun hakeem
Wain fatakum shayon min azwajikum ila alkuffari fa'aqabtum faatoo allatheena thahabat azwajuhum mithla ma anfaqoo wattaqoo Allaha allathee antum bihi muminoon

Ya ayyuha annabiyyu itha jaaka almuminatu yubayi'naka 'ala an la yushrikna billahi shayan wala yasriqna wala yazneena wala yaqtulna awladahunna wala yateena bibuhtanin yaftareenahu bayna aydeehinna waarjulihinna wala ya'seenaka fee ma'roofin fabayi'hunna wastaghfir lahunna Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tatawallaw qawman ghadiba Allahu 'alayhim qad yaisoo mina alakhirati kama yaisa alkuffaru min ashabi alquboor
Sabbaha lillahi ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo lima taqooloona ma la taf'aloon
Kabura maqtan 'inda Allahi an taqooloo ma la taf'aloon
Inna Allaha yuhibbu allatheena yuqatiloona fee sabeelihi saffan kaannahum bunyanun marsoos
Waith qala moosa liqawmihi ya qawmi lima tuthoonanee waqad ta'lamoona annee rasoolu Allahi ilaykum falamma zaghoo azagha Allahu quloobahum wallahu la yahdee alqawma alfasiqeen

Waith qala 'eesa ibnu maryama ya banee israeela innee rasoolu Allahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina attawrati wamubashshiran birasoolin yatee min ba'dee ismuhu ahmadu falamma jaahum bilbayyinati qaloo hatha sihrun mubeen
Waman athlamu mimmani iftara 'ala Allahi alkathiba wahuwa yud'a ila alislami wallahu la yahdee alqawma aththalimeen
Yureedoona liyutfioo noora Allahi biafwahihim wallahu mutimmu noorihi walaw kariha alkafiroon
Huwa allathee arsala rasoolahu bilhuda wadeeni alhaqqi liyuthhirahu 'ala addeeni kullihi walaw kariha almushrikoon
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo hal adullukum 'ala tijaratin tunjeekum min 'athabin aleem
Tuminoona billahi warasoolihi watujahidoona fee sabeeli Allahi biamwalikum waanfusikum thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
Yaghfir lakum thunoobakum wayudkhilkum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu wamasakina tayyibatan fee jannati 'adnin thalika alfawzu al'atheem
Waokhra tuhibboonaha nasrun mina Allahi wafathun qarreebun wabashshiri almumineen

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo koonoo ansara Allahi kama qala 'eesa ibnu maryama lilhawariyyeena man ansaree ila Allahi qala alhawariyyoona nahnu ansaru Allahi faamanat taifatun min banee israeela wakafarat taifatun faayyadna allatheena amanoo 'ala 'aduwwihim faasbahoo thahireen
Yusabbihu lillahi ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi almaliki alquddoosi al'azeezi alhakeem
Huwa allathee ba'atha fee alommiyyeena rasoolan minhum yatloo 'alayhim ayatihi wayuzakkeehim wayu'allimuhumu alkitaba walhikmata wain kanoo min qablu lafee dalalin mubeen
Waakhareena minhum lamma yalhaqoo bihim wahuwa al'azeezu alhakeem
Thalika fadlu Allahi yuteehi man yashao wallahu thoo alfadli al'atheem
Mathalu allatheena hummiloo attawrata thumma lam yahmilooha kamathali alhimari yahmilu asfaran bisa mathalu alqawmi allatheena kaththaboo biayati Allahi wallahu la yahdee alqawma aththalimeen
Qul ya ayyuha allatheena hadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyao lillahi min dooni annasi fatamannawoo almawta in kuntum sadiqeen
Wala yatamannawnahu abadan bima qaddamat aydeehim wallahu 'aleemun biththalimeen
Qul inna almawta allathee tafirroona minhu fainnahu mulaqeekum thumma turaddoona ila 'alimi alghaybi washshahadati fayunabbiokum bima kuntum ta'maloon
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo itha noodiya lissalati min yawmi aljumu'ati fas'aw ila thikri Allahi watharoo albay'a thalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon
Faitha qudiyati assalatu fantashiroo fee alardi wabtaghoo min fadli Allahi wathkuroo Allaha katheeran la'allakum tuflihoon
Waitha raaw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddoo ilayha watarakooka qaiman qul ma 'inda Allahi khayrun mina allahwi wamina attijarati wallahu khayru arraziqeen
Itha jaaka almunafiqoona qaloo nashhadu innaka larasoolu Allahi wallahu ya'lamu innaka larasooluhu wallahu yashhadu inna almunafiqeena lakathiboon
Ittakhathoo aymanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeeli Allahi innahum saa ma kanoo ya'maloon
Thalika biannahum amanoo thumma kafaroo fatubi'a 'ala quloobihim fahum la yafqahoon
Waitha raaytahum tu'jibuka ajsamuhum wain yaqooloo tasma' liqawlihim kaannahum khushubun musannadatun yahsaboona kulla sayhatin 'alayhim humu al'aduwwu fahtharhum qatalahumu Allahu anna yufakoon
Waitha qeela lahum ta'alaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolu Allahi lawwaw ruoosahum waraaytahum yasuddoona wahum mustakbiroon
Sawaon 'alayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira Allahu lahum inna Allaha la yahdee alqawma alfasiqeen
Humu allatheena yaqooloona la tunfiqoo 'ala man 'inda rasooli Allahi hatta yanfaddoo walillahi khazainu assamawati walardi walakinna almunafiqeena la yafqahoon
Yaqooloona lain raja'na ila almadeenati layukhrijanna ala'azzu minha alathalla walillahi al'izzatu walirasoolihi walilmumineena walakinna almunafiqeena la ya'lamoon
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo la tulhikum amwalukum wala awladukum 'an thikri Allahi waman yaf'al thalika faolaika humu alkhasiroon
Waanfiqoo min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu almawtu fayaqoola rabbi lawla akhkhartanee ila ajalin qareebin faassaddaqa waakun mina assaliheen
Walan yuakhkhira Allahu nafsan itha jaa ajaluha wallahu khabeerun bima ta'maloon
Yusabbihu lillahi ma fee assamawati wama fee alardi lahu almulku walahu alhamdu wahuwa 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Huwa allathee khalaqakum faminkum kafirun waminkum muminun wallahu bima ta'maloona baseer
Khalaqa assamawati walarda bilhaqqi wasawwarakum faahsana suwarakum wailayhi almaseer
Ya'lamu ma fee assamawati walardi waya'lamu ma tusirroona wama tu'linoona wallahu 'aleemun bithati assudoor
Alam yatikum nabao allatheena kafaroo min qablu fathaqoo wabala amrihim walahum 'athabun aleem
Thalika biannahu kanat tateehim rusuluhum bilbayyinati faqaloo abasharun yahdoonana fakafaroo watawallaw wastaghna Allahu wallahu ghaniyyun hameed
Za'ama allatheena kafaroo an lan yub'athoo qul bala warabbee latub'athunna thumma latunabbaonna bima 'amiltum wathalika 'ala Allahi yaseer
Faaminoo billahi warasoolihi wannoori allathee anzalna wallahu bima ta'maloona khabeer

Yawma yajma'ukum liyawmi aljam'i thalika yawmu attaghabuni waman yumin billahi waya'mal salihan yukaffir 'anhu sayyiatihi wayudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan thalika alfawzu al'atheem
Wallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboo biayatina olaika ashabu annari khalideena feeha wabisa almaseer
Ma asaba min museebatin illa biithni Allahi waman yumin billahi yahdi qalbahu wallahu bikulli shayin 'aleem
Waatee'oo Allaha waatee'oo arrasoola fain tawallaytum fainnama 'ala rasoolina albalaghu almubeen
Allahu la ilaha illa huwa wa'ala Allahi falyatawakkali almuminoon
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo inna min azwajikum waawladikum 'aduwwan lakum fahtharoohum wain ta'foo watasfahoo wataghfiroo fainna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
Innama amwalukum waawladukum fitnatun wallahu 'indahu ajrun 'atheem
Fattaqoo Allaha ma istata'tum wasma'oo waatee'oo waanfiqoo khayran lianfusikum waman yooqa shuhha nafsihi faolaika humu almuflihoon
In tuqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan yuda'ifhu lakum wayaghfir lakum wallahu shakoorun haleem
'alimu alghaybi washshahadati al'azeezu alhakeem

Ya ayyuha annabiyyu itha tallaqtumu annisaa fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna waahsoo al'iddata wattaqoo Allaha rabbakum la tukhrijoohunna min buyootihinna wala yakhrujna illa an yateena bifahishatin mubayyinatin watilka hudoodu Allahi waman yata'adda hudooda Allahi faqad thalama nafsahu la tadree la'alla Allaha yuhdithu ba'da thalika amra

Faitha balaghna ajalahunna faamsikoohunna bima'roofin aw fariqoohunna bima'roofin waashhidoo thaway 'adlin minkum waaqeemoo ashshahadata lillahi thalikum yoo'athu bihi man kana yuminu billahi walyawmi alakhiri waman yattaqi Allaha yaj'al lahu makhraja
Wayarzuqhu min haythu la yahtasibu waman yatawakkal 'ala Allahi fahuwa hasbuhu inna Allaha balighu amrihi qad ja'ala Allahu likulli shayin qadra

Wallaee yaisna mina almaheedi min nisaikum ini irtabtum fa'iddatuhunna thalathatu ashhurin wallaee lam yahidna waolatu alahmali ajaluhunna an yada'na hamlahunna waman yattaqi Allaha yaj'al lahu min amrihi yusra
Thalika amru Allahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi Allaha yukaffir 'anhu sayyiatihi wayu'thim lahu ajra

Askinoohunna min haythu sakantum min wujdikum wala tudarroohunna litudayyiqoo 'alayhinna wain kunna olati hamlin faanfiqoo 'alayhinna hatta yada'na hamlahunna fain arda'na lakum faatoohunna ojoorahunna watamiroo baynakum bima'roofin wain ta'asartum fasaturdi'u lahu okhra
Liyunfiq thoo sa'atin min sa'atihi waman qudira 'alayhi rizquhu falyunfiq mimma atahu Allahu la yukallifu Allahu nafsan illa ma ataha sayaj'alu Allahu ba'da 'usrin yusra
Wakaayyin min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri rabbiha warusulihi fahasabnaha hisaban shadeedan wa'aththabnaha 'athaban nukra
Fathaqat wabala amriha wakana 'aqibatu amriha khusra
a'adda Allahu lahum 'athaban shadeedan fattaqoo Allaha ya olee alalbabi allatheena amanoo qad anzala Allahu ilaykum thikra

Rasoolan yatloo 'alaykum ayati Allahi mubayyinatin liyukhrija allatheena amanoo wa'amiloo assalihati mina aththulumati ila annoori waman yumin billahi waya'mal salihan yudkhilhu jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu khalideena feeha abadan qad ahsana Allahu lahu rizqa
Allahu allathee khalaqa sab'a samawatin wamina alardi mithlahunna yatanazzalu alamru baynahunna lita'lamoo anna Allaha 'ala kulli shayin qadeerun waanna Allaha qad ahata bikulli shayin 'ilma
Ya ayyuha annabiyyu lima tuharrimu ma ahalla Allahu laka tabtaghee mardata azwajika wallahu ghafoorun raheem
Qad farada Allahu lakum tahillata aymanikum wallahu mawlakum wahuwa al'aleemu alhakeem

Waith asarra annabiyyu ila ba'di azwajihi hadeethan falamma nabbaat bihi waathharahu Allahu 'alayhi 'arrafa ba'dahu waa'rada 'an ba'din falamma nabbaaha bihi qalat man anbaaka hatha qala nabbaaniya al'aleemu alkhabeer
In tatooba ila Allahi faqad saghat quloobukuma wain tathahara 'alayhi fainna Allaha huwa mawlahu wajibreelu wasalihu almumineena walmalaikatu ba'da thalika thaheer
'asa rabbuhu in tallaqakunna an yubdilahu azwajan khayran minkunna muslimatin muminatin qanitatin taibatin 'abidatin saihatin thayyibatin waabkara
Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo qoo anfusakum waahleekum naran waqooduha annasu walhijaratu 'alayha malaikatun ghilathun shidadun la ya'soona Allaha ma amarahum wayaf'aloona ma yumaroon
Ya ayyuha allatheena kafaroo la ta'tathiroo alyawma innama tujzawna ma kuntum ta'maloon

Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoo tooboo ila Allahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asa rabbukum an yukaffira 'ankum sayyiatikum wayudkhilakum jannatin tajree min tahtiha alanharu yawma la yukhzee Allahu annabiyya wallatheena amanoo ma'ahu nooruhum yas'a bayna aydeehim wabiaymanihim yaqooloona rabbana atmim lana noorana waghfir lana innaka 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Ya ayyuha annabiyyu jahidi alkuffara walmunafiqeena waghluth 'alayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabisa almaseer

Daraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena kafaroo imraata noohin wamraata lootin kanata tahta 'abdayni min 'ibadina salihayni fakhanatahuma falam yughniya 'anhuma mina Allahi shayan waqeela odkhula annara ma'a addakhileen
Wadaraba Allahu mathalan lillatheena amanoo imraata fir'awna ith qalat rabbi ibni lee 'indaka baytan fee aljannati wanajjinee min fir'awna wa'amalihi wanajjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen
Wamaryama ibnata 'imrana allatee ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna feehi min roohina wasaddaqat bikalimati rabbiha wakutubihi wakanat mina alqaniteen
Tabaraka allathee biyadihi almulku wahuwa 'ala kulli shayin qadeer
Allathee khalaqa almawta walhayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalan wahuwa al'azeezu alghafoor
Allathee khalaqa sab'a samawatin tibaqan ma tara fee khalqi arrahmani min tafawutin farji'i albasara hal tara min futoor
Thumma irji'i albasara karratayni yanqalib ilayka albasaru khasian wahuwa haseer
Walaqad zayyanna assamaa addunya bimasabeeha waja'alnaha rujooman lishshayateeni waa'tadna lahum 'athaba assa'eer
Walillatheena kafaroo birabbihim 'athabu jahannama wabisa almaseer
Itha olqoo feeha sami'oo laha shaheeqan wahiya tafoor
Takadu tamayyazu mina alghaythi kullama olqiya feeha fawjun saalahum khazanatuha alam yatikum natheer
Qaloo bala qad jaana natheerun fakaththabna waqulna ma nazzala Allahu min shayin in antum illa fee dalalin kabeer
Waqaloo law kunna nasma'u aw na'qilu ma kunna fee ashabi assa'eer
Fa'tarafoo bithanbihim fasuhqan liashabi assa'eer
Inna allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaybi lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeer
Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahu 'aleemun bithati assudoor
Ala ya'lamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefu alkhabeer
Huwa allathee ja'ala lakumu alarda thaloolan famshoo fee manakibiha wakuloo min rizqihi wailayhi annushoor
Aamintum man fee assamai an yakhsifa bikumu alarda faitha hiya tamoor
Am amintum man fee assamai an yursila 'alaykum hasiban fasata'lamoona kayfa natheer
Walaqad kaththaba allatheena min qablihim fakayfa kana nakeer
Awalam yaraw ila attayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna ma yumsikuhunna illa arrahmanu innahu bikulli shayin baseer
Amman hatha allathee huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min dooni arrahmani ini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroor
Amman hatha allathee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwin wanufoor
Afaman yamshee mukibban 'ala wajhihi ahda amman yamshee sawiyyan 'ala siratin mustaqeem
Qul huwa allathee anshaakum waja'ala lakumu assam'a walabsara walafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroon
Qul huwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoon
Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwa'du in kuntum sadiqeen
Qul innama al'ilmu 'inda Allahi wainnama ana natheerun mubeen
Falamma raawhu zulfatan seeat wujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allathee kuntum bihi tadda'oon
Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahu waman ma'iya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireena min 'athabin aleem
Qul huwa arrahmanu amanna bihi wa'alayhi tawakkalna fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalalin mubeen
Qul araaytum in asbaha maokum ghawran faman yateekum bimain ma'een
Noon walqalami wama yasturoon
Ma anta bini'mati rabbika bimajnoon
Wainna laka laajran ghayra mamnoon

Fala tuti'i almukaththibeen

'utullin ba'da thalika zaneem

Itha tutla 'alayhi ayatuna qala asateeru alawwaleen

Waghadaw 'ala hardin qadireen

Qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum lawla tusabbihoon
Qaloo subhana rabbina inna kunna thalimeen
Faaqbala ba'duhum 'ala ba'din yatalawamoon
Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna tagheen
'asa rabbuna an yubdilana khayran minha inna ila rabbina raghiboon
Kathalika al'athabu wala'athabu alakhirati akbaru law kanoo ya'lamoon
Inna lilmuttaqeena 'inda rabbihim jannati anna'eem
Afanaj'alu almuslimeena kalmujrimeen
Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoon
Am lakum kitabun feehi tadrusoon
Inna lakum feehi lama takhayyaroon
Am lakum aymanun 'alayna balighatun ila yawmi alqiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumoon
Salhum ayyuhum bithalika za'eem
Am lahum shurakao falyatoo bishurakaihim in kanoo sadiqeen
Yawma yukshafu 'an saqin wayud'awna ila assujoodi fala yastatee'oon
Khashi'atan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yud'awna ila assujoodi wahum salimoon
Fatharnee waman yukaththibu bihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la ya'lamoon
Waomlee lahum inna kaydee mateen
Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloon
Am 'indahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboon
Fasbir lihukmi rabbika wala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nada wahuwa makthoom
Lawla an tadarakahu ni'matun min rabbihi lanubitha bil'arai wahuwa mathmoom
Fajtabahu rabbuhu faja'alahu mina assaliheen
Wain yakadu allatheena kafaroo layuzliqoonaka biabsarihim lamma sami'oo aththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoon
Wama huwa illa thikrun lil'alameen

Wala biqawli kahinin qaleelan ma tathakkaroon

Laakhathna minhu bilyameen
Thumma laqata'na minhu alwateen

Wainnahu latathkiratun lilmuttaqeen
Wainna lana'lamu anna minkum mukaththibeen
Wainnahu lahasratun 'ala alkafireen
Wainnahu lahaqqu alyaqeen
Fasabbih bismi rabbika al'atheem

Mina Allahi thee alma'arij
Ta'ruju almalaikatu warroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sana
Fasbir sabran jameela
Innahum yarawnahu ba'eeda

Wala yasalu hameemun hameema
Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu law yaftadee min 'athabi yawmiithin bibaneeh
Wasahibatihi waakheeh

Kalla innaha latha
Nazza'atan lishshawa

Illa almusalleen
Allatheena hum 'ala salatihim daimoon
Wallatheena fee amwalihim haqqun ma'loom
Lissaili walmahroom
Wallatheena yusaddiqoona biyawmi addeen
Wallatheena hum min 'athabi rabbihim mushfiqoon
Inna 'athaba rabbihim ghayru mamoon
Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon
Illa 'ala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeen
Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu al'adoon
Wallatheena hum liamanatihim wa'ahdihim ra'oon
Wallatheena hum bishahadatihim qaimoon
Wallatheena hum 'ala salatihim yuhafithoon
Olaika fee jannatin mukramoon
Famali allatheena kafaroo qibalaka muhti'een
'ani alyameeni wa'ani ashshimali 'izeen
Ayatma'u kullu imriin minhum an yudkhala jannata na'eem
Kalla inna khalaqnahum mimma ya'lamoon
Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi walmagharibi inna laqadiroon
'ala an nubaddila khayran minhum wama nahnu bimasbooqeen
Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayal'aboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yoo'adoon
Yawma yakhrujoona mina alajdathi sira'an kaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoon
Khashi'atan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allathee kanoo yoo'adoon
Inna arsalna noohan ila qawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum 'athabun aleem
Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerun mubeen
Ani o'budoo Allaha wattaqoohu waatee'oon
Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayuakhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahi itha jaa la yuakhkharu law kuntum ta'lamoon
Qala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee laylan wanahara
Falam yazidhum du'aee illa firara
Wainnee kullama da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'aloo asabi'ahum fee athanihim wastaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo wastakbaroo istikbara
Thumma innee da'awtuhum jihara
Thumma innee a'lantu lahum waasrartu lahum israra
Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffara
Yursili assamaa 'alaykum midrara
Wayumdidkum biamwalin wabaneena wayaj'al lakum jannatin wayaj'al lakum anhara
Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqara
Waqad khalaqakum atwara
Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa Allahu sab'a samawatin tibaqa
Waja'ala alqamara feehinna nooran waja'ala ashshamsa siraja
Wallahu anbatakum mina alardi nabata
Thumma yu'eedukum feeha wayukhrijukum ikhraja
Wallahu ja'ala lakumu alarda bisata
Litaslukoo minha subulan fijaja
Qala noohun rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasara
Wamakaroo makran kubbara
Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakum wala tatharunna waddan wala suwa'an wala yaghootha waya'ooqa wanasra
Waqad adalloo katheeran wala tazidi aththalimeena illa dalala
Mimma khateeatihim oghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooni Allahi ansara
Waqala noohun rabbi la tathar 'ala alardi mina alkafireena dayyara
Innaka in tatharhum yudilloo 'ibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajiran kaffara
Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya muminan walilmumineena walmuminati wala tazidi aththalimeena illa tabaran
Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istama'a nafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna sami'na quranan 'ajaba
Yahdee ila arrushdi faamanna bihi walan nushrika birabbina ahada
Waannahu ta'ala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhatha sahibatan wala walada
Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehuna 'ala Allahi shatata
Waanna thananna an lan taqoola alinsu waljinnu 'ala Allahi kathiba
Waannahu kana rijalun mina alinsi ya'oothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohum rahaqa
Waannahum thannoo kama thanantum an lan yab'atha Allahu ahada
Waanna lamasna assamaa fawajadnaha muliat harasan shadeedan washuhuba
Waanna kunna naq'udu minha maqa'ida lissam'i faman yastami'i alana yajid lahu shihaban rasada
Waanna la nadree asharrun oreeda biman fee alardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashada
Waanna minna assalihoona waminna doona thalika kunna taraiqa qidada
Wanna thananna an lan nu'jiza Allaha fee alardi walan nu'jizahu haraba
Waanna lamma sami'na alhuda amanna bihi faman yumin birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqa
Waanna minna almuslimoona waminna alqasitoona faman aslama faolaika taharraw rashada
Waama alqasitoona fakanoo lijahannama hataba
Waallawi istaqamoo 'ala attareeqati laasqaynahum maan ghadaqa
Linaftinahum feehi waman yu'rid 'an thikri rabbihi yaslukhu 'athaban sa'ada
Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tad'oo ma'a Allahi ahada
Waannahu lamma qama 'abdu Allahi yad'oohu kadoo yakoonoona 'alayhi libada
Qul innama ad'oo rabbee wala oshriku bihi ahada
Qul innee la amliku lakum darran wala rashada
Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahi ahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahada
Illa balaghan mina Allahi warisalatihi waman ya'si Allaha warasoolahu fainna lahu nara jahannama khalideena feeha abada
Hatta itha raaw ma yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu nasiran waaqallu 'adada
Qul in adree aqareebun ma too'adoona am yaj'alu lahu rabbee amada
'alimu alghaybi fala yuthhiru 'ala ghaybihi ahada
Illa mani irtada min rasoolin fainnahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasada
Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin 'adada
Ya ayyuha almuzzammil
Qumi allayla illa qaleela
Nisfahu awi onqus minhu qaleela
Aw zid 'alayhi warattili alqurana tarteela
Inna sanulqee 'alayka qawlan thaqeela

Rabbu almashriqi walmaghribi la ilaha illa huwa fattakhithhu wakeela
Wasbir 'ala ma yaqooloona wahjurhum hajran jameela
Watharnee walmukaththibeena olee anna'mati wamahhilhum qaleela

Inna arsalna ilaykum rasoolan shahidan 'alaykum kama arsalna ila fir'awna rasoola
Fa'asa fir'awnu arrasoola faakhathnahu akhthan wabeela
Fakayfa tattaqoona in kafartum yawman yaj'alu alwildana sheeba
Assamao munfatirun bihi kana wa'duhu maf'oola
Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela

Inna rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adna min thuluthayi allayli wanisfahu wathuluthahu wataifatun mina allatheena ma'aka wallahu yuqaddiru allayla wannahara 'alima an lan tuhsoohu fataba 'alaykum faqraoo ma tayassara mina alqurani 'alima an sayakoonu minkum marda waakharoona yadriboona fee alardi yabtaghoona min fadli Allahi waakharoona yuqatiloona fee sabeeli Allahi faqraoo ma tayassara minhu waaqeemoo assalata waatoo azzakata waaqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan wama tuqaddimoo lianfusikum min khayrin tajidoohu 'inda Allahi huwa khayran waa'thama ajran wastaghfiroo Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem
